snippet.title: amber heard and johnny depp reach a settlement
snippet.description:
amber heard has dismissed her domestic violence restraining order against johnny depp.
according to sources, the divorce case, which was linked to the domestic violence petition has reportedly been settled, after the pair reached an agreement worth approximately 7 million dollars.
court documents state that "amber will be donating financial proceeds from the divorce to a charity" and that "there will be no further public statements about this matter."

thats that, we hope. good luck to johnny depp and amber heard in their future endeavors.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard And Johnny Depp Reach A Settlement
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard has dismissed her domestic violence restraining order against Johnny Depp.
According to sources, the divorce case, which was linked to the domestic violence petition has reportedly been settled, after the pair reached an agreement worth approximately 7 million dollars.
Court documents state that "Amber will be donating financial proceeds from the divorce to a charity" and that "There will be no further public statements about this matter."

Thats that, we hope. Good luck to Johnny Depp and Amber Heard in their future endeavors.

amber heard has experienced her share of hardships in 2016, and while she finalizes her divorce from johnny depp, it seems she’s doing her best to heal… and help others in the process. 

amber wrote an open letter in porter magazine, addressing domestic abuse. although the actress has since dropped charges, she has accused depp of physically and verbally abusing her throughout their relationship. 

amber writes, “you are not alone. you may have suffered alone behind closed doors, but you are not alone… you need to know that. i want to remind you of your strength, a strength that has been multiplied by the number of women who stand silently behind you – a truth hat allowed me to break down the doors i once found myself behind.”

snippet.title: amber heard should have stayed the same | johnny depp
snippet.description:
the other day, my friend simone posted a link on my facebook wall about how amber heard filed for divorce from johnny depp mere days after his mother died. she was like “bitch is savage af”, to which i agreed and intended to make a post about. i mean, what kind of bitch files for divorce less than a week after their husband’s mom dies?

a bitch who isn’t a bitch, but apparently a victim of domestic violence, that’s who. today, amber heard emerged from a courtroom with a beaten up face as a judge granted her request for a restraining order against johnny depp after she filed domestic abuse charges against him. as of right now, it seems like not only is johnny depp a fading hollywood heart throb who might genuinely believe he has become jack sparrow what with the gold teeth and puffy shirts and all, but he might also be a real piece of shit who beats on his sexy young wife who really should have just stayed with her sexy girlfriend, because the world was a happier place for everyone when amber heard was a lesbian. 
in her court filings, she claimed that last saturday depp hit her with a cell phone, pulled her hair and screamed at her. she also alleged that he was abusive throughout their entire 15-month marriage which is why she bailed. all of us who judged amber as a mega, gold-digging bitch with a heart made of ice for dumping johnny a couple of days after his mom died sure look like assholes now, hey? in her court filing, amber says that johnny was verbally and physically aggressive towards her during their entire message, but i guess him going all naomi campbell on her by chucking a cell phone at her face was the last straw. she went and filed the police report after that and they took pics of her cell phone beaten face. here’s the thing about a lot of these major hunks from the 90s: sometimes they turn out to really fucking suck. i mean, amber and i are the same age, born in 1986, and she probably grew up thinking he was really talented and hot like so many people in the 80s and 90s did,. then she grows up, he proposes, and she scores her childhood crush. too bad he turns out to be a dog smuggling, anti-oral hygiene, pirate wannabe who throws cell phones at her fucking face like he’s latoya fucking jackson. and look at katie holmes! she grew up in the 80s and 90s probably thinking tom cruise was the shit and figured she was mega #blessed when they started dating. but instead of fulfilling her pubescent fantasies with the dude from “risky business”, she got sucked into the cult of scientology for several years and had to make that god awful “mad money” movie with queen latifah! if it weren’t for brad pitt, i’d assume all the major heart throbs of my youth were weird pieces of shit.

even though the title of this blog was technically click bait that i stole from my friend simone’s sister-in-law (or cousin-in-law, i forget), i do hope amber will go back to dating hot ladies rather than abusive douche bag has-beens. i think she’d be much better off with a ruby rose rather than a mel gibson.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Should Have Stayed THE SAME | Johnny Depp
snippet.localized.description:
The other day, my friend Simone posted a link on my Facebook wall about how Amber Heard filed for divorce from Johnny Depp mere days after his mother died. She was like “Bitch is savage af”, to which I agreed and intended to make a post about. I mean, what kind of bitch files for divorce less than a week after their husband’s mom dies?

A bitch who isn’t a bitch, but apparently a victim of domestic violence, that’s who. Today, Amber Heard emerged from a courtroom with a beaten up face as a judge granted her request for a restraining order against Johnny Depp after she filed domestic abuse charges against him. As of right now, it seems like not only is Johnny Depp a fading Hollywood heart throb who might genuinely believe he has become Jack Sparrow what with the gold teeth and puffy shirts and all, but he might also be a real piece of shit who beats on his sexy young wife who really should have just stayed with her sexy girlfriend, because the world was a happier place for everyone when Amber Heard was a lesbian. 
In her court filings, she claimed that last Saturday Depp hit her with a cell phone, pulled her hair and screamed at her. She also alleged that he was abusive throughout their entire 15-month marriage which is why she bailed. All of us who judged Amber as a mega, gold-digging bitch with a heart made of ice for dumping Johnny a couple of days after his mom died sure look like assholes now, hey? In her court filing, Amber says that Johnny was verbally and physically aggressive towards her during their entire message, but I guess him going all Naomi Campbell on her by chucking a cell phone at her face was the last straw. She went and filed the police report after that and they took pics of her cell phone beaten face. Here’s the thing about a lot of these major hunks from the 90s: sometimes they turn out to really fucking suck. I mean, Amber and I are the same age, born in 1986, and she probably grew up thinking he was really talented and hot like so many people in the 80s and 90s did,. Then she grows up, he proposes, and she scores her childhood crush. Too bad he turns out to be a dog smuggling, anti-oral hygiene, pirate wannabe who throws cell phones at her fucking face like he’s Latoya fucking Jackson. And look at Katie Holmes! She grew up in the 80s and 90s probably thinking Tom Cruise was the shit and figured she was mega #blessed when they started dating. But instead of fulfilling her pubescent fantasies with the dude from “Risky Business”, she got sucked into the cult of Scientology for several years and had to make that god awful “Mad Money” movie with Queen Latifah! If it weren’t for Brad Pitt, I’d assume all the major heart throbs of my youth were weird pieces of shit.

Even though the title of this blog was technically click bait that I stole from my friend Simone’s sister-in-law (or cousin-in-law, I forget), I do hope Amber will go back to dating hot ladies rather than abusive douche bag has-beens. I think she’d be much better off with a Ruby Rose rather than a Mel Gibson.

snippet.title: kentucky jail sends black woman to court with no pants, judge flips out
snippet.description:
woman not wearing pants in court video.

a black girl from kentucky was humiliated by jail officials when she was brought into a courtroom without pants, leaving a louisville judge in disbelief.

“am i in the twilight zone right now?” judge amber wolf asked on courtroom video friday afternoon. 

the female defendant in the video was in jail for failing to complete a diversion program for a prior shoplifting charge. during her time at metro corrections in louisville she said she was never given a uniform and was forced to spend her time there without pants or feminine hygiene products.

wolf immediately began making phone calls to metro corrections officials in the video, outraged over the treatment of the woman.

“i’m not trying to embarrass you, i’m very sorry,” wolf told the defendant in court. “can we get her something to cover up with? anything, anything, anything. i don’t care what it is.”

steve durham, a spokesman for the jail, told local station wdrb that the woman had not been in custody long enough to receive a jail jumpsuit. she had been in the jail for three days prior to her court appearance.

“what the hell is going on?” wolf can be heard saying on the phone. “i am holding her here until she is dressed appropriately to go back to jail. this is outrageous.”

“this is her only charge ever,” wolf added. “she should have been in jail for maybe a day, tops.”

jail officials contend that the woman was wearing athletic shorts covered by a long shirt, according to wdrb. the defendant told the judge other inmates at the facility were also being denied proper clothing and basic hygiene products.
snippet.tags: ['Kentucky Jail Sends Black Woman to Court With No Pants', 'Judge Flips Out 2', 'black people', 'blacks']

Woman not wearing pants in court video.

A black girl from Kentucky was humiliated by jail officials when she was brought into a courtroom without pants, leaving a Louisville judge in disbelief.

“Am I in the Twilight Zone right now?” Judge Amber Wolf asked on courtroom video Friday afternoon. 

The female defendant in the video was in jail for failing to complete a diversion program for a prior shoplifting charge. During her time at Metro Corrections in Louisville she said she was never given a uniform and was forced to spend her time there without pants or feminine hygiene products.

Wolf immediately began making phone calls to Metro Corrections officials in the video, outraged over the treatment of the woman.

“I’m not trying to embarrass you, I’m very sorry,” Wolf told the defendant in court. “Can we get her something to cover up with? Anything, anything, anything. I don’t care what it is.”

Steve Durham, a spokesman for the jail, told local station WDRB that the woman had not been in custody long enough to receive a jail jumpsuit. She had been in the jail for three days prior to her court appearance.

“What the hell is going on?” Wolf can be heard saying on the phone. “I am holding her here until she is dressed appropriately to go back to jail. This is outrageous.”

“This is her only charge ever,” Wolf added. “She should have been in jail for maybe a day, tops.”

Jail officials contend that the woman was wearing athletic shorts covered by a long shirt, according to WDRB. The defendant told the judge other inmates at the facility were also being denied proper clothing and basic hygiene products.

amber heard will reportedly stay close to johnny depp 's daughter despite the breakdown of their marriage.

it was revealed this week that the actress had filed for divorce from the pirates of the caribbean actor 15 months after they tied the knot, but it is said it won't affect her friendship with lily-rose.
speaking to e! news , a source said: "amber and lily-rose developed a strong bond early on. amber and lily-rose spent many days together without johnny; going shopping, going out to eat, the movies.
it is said things came to a head last month shortly after they were forced to appear in an embarrassing apology video, after illegally bringing their dogs into australia, which made them a global laughing stock.

“johnny felt humiliated by the whole ordeal and believes amber made him look like a fool," a source told the paper.

snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard 'will remain close to Johnny Depp's daughter Lily-Rose despite divorce
Although the actress has split from Lily-Rose's dad, the pair are expected to stay in touch
Amber Heard will reportedly stay close to Johnny Depp 's daughter despite the breakdown of their marriage.

It was revealed this week that the actress had filed for divorce from the Pirates of the Caribbean actor 15 months after they tied the knot, but it is said it won't affect her friendship with Lily-Rose.
Speaking to E! News , a source said: "Amber and Lily-Rose developed a strong bond early on. Amber and Lily-Rose spent many days together without Johnny; going shopping, going out to eat, the movies.
It is said things came to a head last month shortly after they were forced to appear in an embarrassing apology video, after illegally bringing their dogs into Australia, which made them a global laughing stock.

“Johnny felt humiliated by the whole ordeal and believes Amber made him look like a fool," a source told the paper.
“It just doesn’t fit with his serious image and he hated being mocked. The dogs are Amber’s so she should really have done the thorough checks
Actress Amber Heard has been granted the right to stay in the home she shared with Johnny Depp after she was awarded a temporary restraining order against him.
The Drive Angry star - who has claimed she was subject to domestic violence from her estranged husband - asked for the house they shared, their dogs, and their Range Rover as part of her court documents. amid the abuse allegations.
Amber, 30, was pictured with a bruised face as part of her court claim.
Now the judge has granted the temporary restraining order, requiring Johnny to stay 100 yards away from Amber until a court hearing in June

snippet.title: alleged rape victim 'horrified' after death of photographer david hamilton (live news)
snippet.description:
the movie, based on a martin amis novel, was removed from a film festival and has been stuck in legal purgatory ever since.

amber heard is facing a $10m (£8m) lawsuit for "breach of performance and promotional obligations" in her latest film london fields.

the actress is said to have "falsely claimed" she had "not agreed to the use of nude and simulated sex scenes", among other accusations.

this is the latest in a string of legal cases surrounding the unreleased film.

it comes after director mathew cullen sued the film's producers for fraud, claiming they hijacked the final cut of the movie.

the producers hit back with a counterclaim, accusing cullen of failing to deliver the film on budget and on time.

london fields, based on martin amis' celebrated novel, was supposed to premiere last year at the toronto film festival.

but despite high anticipation, the film got stuck in legal purgatory without a distributor.

now, heard is facing claims of breaching contract and "committing tortious interference".

the complaint, filed in los angeles superior court, blames heard for "hijacking the film" and "placing it under a limbo".

"while the inherent tension between actors and directors (on the one hand) and producers (on the other) is nothing new in hollywood, the unauthorised and unlawful acts of heard, cullen, and others - most notably, their campaign to damage plaintiff, the picture, and the picture's investors - are perhaps unprecedented," it reads.

it states heard disregarded contractual obligations by failing to promote the movie.

adding to the intrigue are rumours that the film played a part on the actress' divorce from johnny depp.

depp, who makes a cameo in the film, was accused by heard of having written the name of co-star billy bob thornton in blood in the couple's bathroom wall.

london fields stars thornton as samson young, a terminally ill writer who has suffered from writer's block for twenty years, and femme fatale amber heard, stuck in the middle of a love triangle.

snippet.localized.title: Alleged rape victim 'horrified' after death of photographer David Hamilton (Live News)
snippet.localized.description:
The movie, based on a Martin Amis novel, was removed from a film festival and has been stuck in legal purgatory ever since.

Amber Heard is facing a $10m (£8m) lawsuit for "breach of performance and promotional obligations" in her latest film London Fields.

The actress is said to have "falsely claimed" she had "not agreed to the use of nude and simulated sex scenes", among other accusations.

This is the latest in a string of legal cases surrounding the unreleased film.

It comes after director Mathew Cullen sued the film's producers for fraud, claiming they hijacked the final cut of the movie.

The producers hit back with a counterclaim, accusing Cullen of failing to deliver the film on budget and on time.

London Fields, based on Martin Amis' celebrated novel, was supposed to premiere last year at the Toronto Film Festival.

But despite high anticipation, the film got stuck in legal purgatory without a distributor.

Now, Heard is facing claims of breaching contract and "committing tortious interference".

The complaint, filed in Los Angeles Superior Court, blames Heard for "hijacking the film" and "placing it under a limbo".

"While the inherent tension between actors and directors (on the one hand) and producers (on the other) is nothing new in Hollywood, the unauthorised and unlawful acts of Heard, Cullen, and others - most notably, their campaign to damage Plaintiff, the Picture, and the Picture's investors - are perhaps unprecedented," it reads.

It states Heard disregarded contractual obligations by failing to promote the movie.

Adding to the intrigue are rumours that the film played a part on the actress' divorce from Johnny Depp.

Depp, who makes a cameo in the film, was accused by Heard of having written the name of co-star Billy Bob Thornton in blood in the couple's bathroom wall.

London Fields stars Thornton as Samson Young, a terminally ill writer who has suffered from writer's block for twenty years, and femme fatale Amber Heard, stuck in the middle of a love triangle.

About The Doctors:

The Doctors is an Emmy award-winning daytime talk show hosted by ER physician Dr. Travis Stork, plastic surgeon Dr. Andrew Ordon, OB-GYN Dr. Jennifer Ashton, urologist Dr. Jennifer Berman and family medicine physician and sexologist Dr. Rachael Ross.

The Doctors helps you understand the latest health headlines, such as the ice bucket challenge for ALS and the Ebola outbreak; delivers exclusive interviews with celebrities dealing with health issues, such as Teen Mom star Farrah Abraham, reality stars Honey Boo Boo and Mama June and activist Chaz Bono; brings you debates about health and safety claims from agricultural company Monsanto and celebrities such as Jenny McCarthy; and shows you the latest gross viral videos and explains how you can avoid an emergency situation. The Doctors also features the News in 2:00 digest of the latest celebrity health news and The Doctors’ Prescription for simple steps to get active, combat stress, eat better and live healthier. 

Now in its eighth season, The Doctors celebrity guests have included Academy Award Winners Sally Field, Barbra Streisand, Jane Fonda, Marcia Gay Harden, Kathy Bates and Marisa Tomei; reality stars from Teen Mom and The Real Housewives, as well as Kris Jenner, Caitlyn Jenner, Melissa Rivers, Sharon Osbourne, Tim Gunn and Amber Rose; actors Jessica Alba, Christina Applegate, Julie Bowen, Patricia Heaton, Chevy Chase, Kristin Davis, Lou Ferrigno, Harrison Ford, Grace Gealey, Cedric the Entertainer, Valerie Harper, Debra Messing, Chris O’Donnell, Betty White, Linda Gray, Fran Drescher, Emmy Rossum, Roseanne Barr, Valerie Bertinelli, Suzanne Somers; athletes Magic Johnson, Apolo Ohno and Danica Patrick; musicians Tim McGraw, Justin Bieber, Clint Black, LL Cool J,  Nick Carter, Kristin Chenoweth, Paula Abdul, Gloria Gaynor, La Toya Jackson, Barry Manilow, Bret Michaels, Gene Simmons and Jordin Sparks; and celebrity chefs Wolfgang Puck, Guy Fieri and Curtis Stone.

snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp und Amber Heard: 'Krieg gegen die Terrier' beendet
snippet.localized.description:
Nach der illegalen Einreise der beiden Hunde von Johnny Depp und Amber Heard nach Australien kamen die beiden glimpflich davon.
Im Streit um die illegale Einreise ihrer Hunde sind die Schauspieler Johnny Depp und seine Frau Amber Heard glimpflich davon gekommen. Vor dem australischen Gericht gestand Heard am Montag, die Quarantänepapiere für ihre beiden Yorckshire-Terrier gefälscht zu haben, als sie im vergangenen Jahr nach Australien einreiste. Vor der Verhandlung hatten Depp und Heard ein Video aufgenommen und sich für ihr Verhalten entschuldigt. Weil sie sich geständig zeigten verhängte das Gericht nur eine kurze Bewährungsstrafe.

Die Sache wurde publik, als Heard im vergangenen Jahr mit ihren Terriern Pistol und Boo in Australien zu einem Hundefriseur ging. Der australische Landwirtschaftsminister drohte daraufhin, die beiden Terrier einschläfern zu lassen. Kurz vor dem Ablauf des Ultimatums ließ die Schauspielerin ihre Hunde in die USA zurückbringen.

In Australien gelten strenge Regeln für die Einreise von Tieren. Um das Einschleppen von Krankheiten zu verhindern müssen Hunde und Katzen für zehn Tage in Quarantäne bleiben, bevor sie einreisen dürfen. Wer dagegen verstößt kann mit zehn Jahren Gefängnis und einer Geldbuße von 10.000 Dollar bestraft werden.

amber heard domestic violence arrest unearthed: actress 'struck girlfriend in argument'

amber heard was once arrested for domestic violence against her then-girlfriend, it has emerged.

the actress is currently involved in drama surrounding ex-husband johnny depp, who she alleges was abusive towards her during their 18 month marriage.

in images obtained by tmz, amber was seen with a bruised eye, which she claims was the result of depp throwing an iphone at her face.

the 30-year-old was granted a restraining order against johnny following the allegations.

however, in a bizarre twist, it has now been revealed that amber herself was once booked for a domestic violence charge.

tmz have unearthed documents which state that amber was arrested and booked for misdemeanour domestic violence after a fight with then-girlfriend tasya van ree.

according to the documents, the couple were at seattle-tacoma international airport on september 14, 2009 when they began to argue.

amber allegedly grabbed tasya and "struck her in the arm", which led to amber's arrest.

snippet.localized.description:
Court Hearing 14 Sept 2009 - Amber Heard Alleged Abuse Against Then Partner Tasy van Ree

Amber Heard domestic violence arrest unearthed: Actress 'struck girlfriend in argument'

Amber Heard was once arrested for domestic violence against her then-girlfriend, it has emerged.

The actress is currently involved in drama surrounding ex-husband Johnny Depp, who she alleges was abusive towards her during their 18 month marriage.

In images obtained by TMZ, Amber was seen with a bruised eye, which she claims was the result of Depp throwing an iPhone at her face.

The 30-year-old was granted a restraining order against Johnny following the allegations.

However, in a bizarre twist, it has now been revealed that Amber herself was once booked for a domestic violence charge.

TMZ have unearthed documents which state that Amber was arrested and booked for misdemeanour domestic violence after a fight with then-girlfriend Tasya van Ree.

According to the documents, the couple were at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport on September 14, 2009 when they began to argue.

Amber allegedly grabbed Tasya and "struck her in the arm", which led to Amber's arrest.

snippet.title: amber heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. people still didn’t believe her
snippet.description:
amber heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. people still didn’t believe her, by constance grady.

like our video: https://youtu.be/volhrsrjikk
the divorce of amber heard and johnny depp is now final, and one thing’s for sure: heard didn’t get any money out of it.

she settled the divorce out of court for $7 million, all of which she has now donated to charitable causes. she’s splitting the sum between the american civil liberties union’s efforts to battle violence against women and the children’s hospital of los angeles, where she’s volunteered for the past 10 years.

and in a joint statement, both heard and depp affirmed that “neither party has made false accusations for financial gain.”

in other words: heard is not a gold digger, and she did not accuse depp of cutting off part of his finger and then using the stump to finger paint the words “easy amber” on a mirror because she thought that would be a cool quick way to make some cash.

it’s a shame heard felt the need to be so emphatic about the fact that she isn’t lying about her domestic violence claims, but it’s not surprising. ever since she first filed for a restraining order against depp in may, heard has done everything we say domestic abuse survivors should do. she went to the police. she provided copious documentation. she went above and beyond to prove she wasn’t in it for the money.

people still insisted she was lying.
the history of heard’s domestic violence allegations spans at least two years

on may 21, heard says she asked a friend to call the police after depp hit her with an iphone and struck her. when they arrived, hear told them she and depp had only been arguing — which she now says was an attempt to protect depp’s career. (it’s extremely common for victims of domestic abuse to feel the need to protect their abusers.)

amber heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. people still didn’t believe her
snippet.tags: ['News', 'Daily News', 'News Daily', 'amber heard did what abuse victims are supposed to do people still didn t believe her vox']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. People still didn’t believe her
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. People still didn’t believe her, by Constance Grady.

Like our Video: https://youtu.be/VolhRSrJIKk
The divorce of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp is now final, and one thing’s for sure: Heard didn’t get any money out of it.

She settled the divorce out of court for $7 million, all of which she has now donated to charitable causes. She’s splitting the sum between the American Civil Liberties Union’s efforts to battle violence against women and the Children’s Hospital of Los Angeles, where she’s volunteered for the past 10 years.

And in a joint statement, both Heard and Depp affirmed that “neither party has made false accusations for financial gain.”

In other words: Heard is not a gold digger, and she did not accuse Depp of cutting off part of his finger and then using the stump to finger paint the words “Easy Amber” on a mirror because she thought that would be a cool quick way to make some cash.

It’s a shame Heard felt the need to be so emphatic about the fact that she isn’t lying about her domestic violence claims, but it’s not surprising. Ever since she first filed for a restraining order against Depp in May, Heard has done everything we say domestic abuse survivors should do. She went to the police. She provided copious documentation. She went above and beyond to prove she wasn’t in it for the money.

People still insisted she was lying.
The history of Heard’s domestic violence allegations spans at least two years

On May 21, Heard says she asked a friend to call the police after Depp hit her with an iPhone and struck her. When they arrived, Hear told them she and Depp had only been arguing — which she now says was an attempt to protect Depp’s career. (It’s extremely common for victims of domestic abuse to feel the need to protect their abusers.)

Amber Heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. People still didn’t believe her

Amber Heard was reportedly arrested for domestic violence in 2009 after a fight with her girlfriend. According to TMZ she was charged with misdemeanor domestic violence but the prosecutor declined to move forward with the case because the couple were residents of California.

The Playboy mansion has been sold. Hugh Hefner's neighbor bought the legendary home. The mansion was purchased by Playboy Enterprises in 1971 for just over a million dollars. The sale comes with the condition that Hefner will be able to remain in the home as long as he lives. The home was listed for $200 million but no purchase price has been released.

snippet.title: video muestra reacción violenta de johnny depp contra amber heard
snippet.description:
el proceso de divorcio de amber heard y johnny depp está tomando tintes truculentos con la salida de unas imágenes que muestran al actor en su faceta más violenta.

el video publicado por el portal tmz muestra a depp tirando las puertas de los muebles de la cocina y dando voces sin que sepamos por qué lo hace. fuentes citadas por el mismo medio indican que el video puede haber sido editado y que no salen imágenes de heard presuntamente provocando a depp.

procedente de londres, la actriz no ha querido confirmar o desmentir si ha sido ella la que ha filtrado el material.

posteriormente su equipo ha dicho que no fueron ellos los que filtraron estas imágenes, elemento que podría marcar el sino del juicio.
lo que si hemos podido ver ha sido unas marcas en los brazos de amber que dan mucho qué pensar. ¿se trata de más pruebas para demostrar el presunto maltrato de depp?
¿es posible que sean resultado del duro trabajo de la actriz durante los días que estuvo en londres?
lo cierto es que el equipo legal de heard ha indicado que están buscando un acuerdo con johnny tan pronto como sea posible.

el listado de testigos de heard es de 7 personas. por el lado de johnny depp, son 23 incluyendo 
a su ex mujer, vanessa paradis, quienes hacen parte de sus testigos.
amber ya ha declarado pero aún es pronto para sacar conclusiones.
-----------------------------------
visítenos en www.celebmas.com
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'Johnny Depp', 'juicio', 'video', 'declaracion', 'reaccion violenta', 'portada']
snippet.localized.title: Video muestra reacción violenta de Johnny Depp contra Amber Heard
snippet.localized.description:
El proceso de divorcio de Amber Heard y Johnny Depp está tomando tintes truculentos con la salida de unas imágenes que muestran al actor en su faceta más violenta.

El video publicado por el portal TMZ muestra a Depp tirando las puertas de los muebles de la cocina y dando voces sin que sepamos por qué lo hace. Fuentes citadas por el mismo medio indican que el video puede haber sido editado y que no salen imágenes de Heard presuntamente provocando a Depp.

Procedente de Londres, la actriz no ha querido confirmar o desmentir si ha sido ella la que ha filtrado el material.

Posteriormente su equipo ha dicho que no fueron ellos los que filtraron estas imágenes, elemento que podría marcar el sino del juicio.
Lo que si hemos podido ver ha sido unas marcas en los brazos de Amber que dan mucho qué pensar. ¿Se trata de más pruebas para demostrar el presunto maltrato de Depp?
¿Es posible que sean resultado del duro trabajo de la actriz durante los días que estuvo en Londres?
Lo cierto es que el equipo legal de Heard ha indicado que están buscando un acuerdo con Johnny tan pronto como sea posible.

El listado de testigos de Heard es de 7 personas. Por el lado de Johnny Depp, son 23 incluyendo 
a su ex mujer, Vanessa Paradis, quienes hacen parte de sus testigos.
Amber ya ha declarado pero aún es pronto para sacar conclusiones.
-----------------------------------
Visítenos en www.celebmas.com

snippet.title: comic doug stanhope to amber heard: your lawsuit is 'bullshit'
snippet.description:
stanhope insists her legal action is "bullshit" because he was merely defending his friend in a post on his website - not penning a explosive op-ed for thewrap, in which he claimed the actress was blackmailing her estranged husband.

appearing on the howard stern show on monday (20jun16), the 49-year-old said he put his thoughts down in a post on his website six days after depp and heard officially split last month (may16).

he told stern, "the title was 'at a loss for words...' thewrap got it as an exclusive, however that worked, and said, 'amber heard is blackmailing johnny depp - this is how i know'. i didn't write that f**king title. i didn't put that stupid tabloid title in there. i'm a better writer than that, so i don't know if it's hinged on that, i don't know how much of it is spite."

heard has called the piece "highly defamatory", but stanhope insists his pal depp was happy with it: "i had no contact with him (depp) until he texted me after that went out and said, 'hey, thanks for being honest'. he didn't know that was going out. i was a little petrified because it kind of made him look like a b**ch."

and stanhope isn't taking amber's legal attack too seriously, smiling, "the idea of some hollywood supermodel lady winning all of my s**t... she would be locking the doors driving down my street even without seeing a person. i live on the mexican border in this dirty pothole-riddled neighbourhood."

the comic reveals his pal depp gave him a heads up about the split and suggested amber might accuse the actor of abusing her when the two friends spent time together on 21 may (16).

stanhope told stern, "he was alluding to the fact that she was going to do something like this. she didn't come out until a week later that that happened. but it happened that night, and he was alluding to she's going to do something like this.

"i think what she's trying to do is make me shut the f**k up, because i can't say anything about it, and now i'm talking more."

heard, 30, filed her defamation lawsuit against stanhope on 3 june (16). her lawyers accused him of trying to "divert public attention away from the true facts regarding depp which caused their marriage to fail, namely, that depp repeatedly abused heard throughout their marriage, at times to the point of her fearing for her life."

audio courtesy of "the howard stern show"
snippet.tags: ['Howard Stern Show', 'Amber Heard', 'Johnny Depp', 'Doug Stanhope']
snippet.localized.title: Comic Doug Stanhope To Amber Heard: Your lawsuit is 'bullshit'
snippet.localized.description:
Stanhope insists her legal action is "bullshit" because he was merely defending his friend in a post on his website - not penning a explosive op-ed for TheWrap, in which he claimed the actress was blackmailing her estranged husband.

Appearing on The Howard Stern Show on Monday (20Jun16), the 49-year-old said he put his thoughts down in a post on his website six days after Depp and Heard officially split last month (May16).

He told Stern, "The title was 'At a Loss for Words...' TheWrap got it as an exclusive, however that worked, and said, 'Amber Heard Is Blackmailing Johnny Depp - This Is How I Know'. I didn't write that f**king title. I didn't put that stupid tabloid title in there. I'm a better writer than that, so I don't know if it's hinged on that, I don't know how much of it is spite."

Heard has called the piece "highly defamatory", but Stanhope insists his pal Depp was happy with it: "I had no contact with him (Depp) until he texted me after that went out and said, 'Hey, thanks for being honest'. He didn't know that was going out. I was a little petrified because it kind of made him look like a b**ch."

And Stanhope isn't taking Amber's legal attack too seriously, smiling, "The idea of some Hollywood supermodel lady winning all of my s**t... She would be locking the doors driving down my street even without seeing a person. I live on the Mexican border in this dirty pothole-riddled neighbourhood."

The comic reveals his pal Depp gave him a heads up about the split and suggested Amber might accuse the actor of abusing her when the two friends spent time together on 21 May (16).

Stanhope told Stern, "He was alluding to the fact that she was going to do something like this. She didn't come out until a week later that that happened. But it happened that night, and he was alluding to she's going to do something like this.

"I think what she's trying to do is make me shut the f**k up, because I can't say anything about it, and now I'm talking more."

Heard, 30, filed her defamation lawsuit against Stanhope on 3 June (16). Her lawyers accused him of trying to "divert public attention away from the true facts regarding Depp which caused their marriage to fail, namely, that Depp repeatedly abused Heard throughout their marriage, at times to the point of her fearing for her life."

Audio Courtesy of "The Howard Stern Show"

Stephen Colbert took over as host of The Late Show on Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015. Colbert is best known for his work as a television host, writer, actor, and producer, and best known for his charity work teaching English as a second language on Tunisian date farms. Prior to joining the CBS family -- and being officially adopted by network president Les Moonves -- Colbert helmed �The Colbert Report,� which aired nearly 1,500 episodes and required Stephen to wear nearly 1,500 different neckties. snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard arrives for deposition against Johnny Depp - DIBC News
snippet.localized.description:
Subscribe to DIBC News now for more videos.

Date of production: 13 August 2016

Date of publication: 13 August 2016

Transcription

-----

Amber Heard arrived at a scheduled deposition at 10:00 on Saturday in Los Angeles, as part of an ongoing and increasingly messy divorce with Johnny Depp.

Amber, aged 30, has accused Johnny Depp of domestic violence, and filed for divorce from the actor on May 25, two days later, she filed a domestic violence restraining order against Depp.

The actress flew into Los Angeles on Friday night after telling the judge that she couldn’t make the deposition scheduled for earlier that day due to an “emergency” that prevented her from catching her flight on time.

A week ago she showed up for a deposition, but according to TMZ, refused to enter the conference room where lawyers and videographer were present.

The actress allegedly cried and screamed, and refused to submit to questioning.

-----

snippet.title: johnny depp and amber heard apologise for dog smuggling
snippet.description:
johnny depp and amber heard have released this awkward apology video after heard brought the couple's yorkshire terriers (pistol and boo) into australia without declaring them.

the apology was played in court as heard escaped conviction after pleading guilty to falsifying immigration forms when she brought the dogs into australia, where depp was filming pirates of the caribbean: dead men tell no tales.

the case made global headlines last may after australia’s agriculture minister barnaby joyce threatened to have the pets, pistol and boo, put down unless they “buggered off back to the united states”: http://jrnl.ie/2721154

video credit: australian government department of agriculture and water resources

snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard apologise for dog smuggling
snippet.localized.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have released this awkward apology video after Heard brought the couple's Yorkshire Terriers (Pistol and Boo) into Australia without declaring them.

The apology was played in court as Heard escaped conviction after pleading guilty to falsifying immigration forms when she brought the dogs into Australia, where Depp was filming Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales.

The case made global headlines last May after Australia’s Agriculture Minister Barnaby Joyce threatened to have the pets, Pistol and Boo, put down unless they “buggered off back to the United States”: http://jrnl.ie/2721154

Video Credit: Australian Government Department of Agriculture and Water Resources

snippet.title: johnny depp attends charity event in lisbon during divorce drama
snippet.description:
(27 may 2016) 
ap entertainment
lisbon, 27 may 2016
1. close of johnny depp and joe perry entering the room, pull out to wide 
2. close of johnny depp
3. various of johnny depp interacting with elderly lady patient
4. close of alice cooper and joe perry
5. mid of johnny depp, alice cooper placing hearing device in lady's ear 
6. soundbite (english) joe perry, recording artist:
"i've lost a bit of hearing over the years you know because of what i do and i've been through this and i know what it's like to have the sound come back, you know, and it's like - it's incredible what dr. starkey does and to take part it's a privilege. it really is. it's a feeling that you don't get either way.
7. close of johnny depp interacting with patient
8. close of alice cooper
9. mid of bruce witkin (left), robert deleo (center) and tommy henriksen (right), members of hollywood vampires
10. mid of johnny depp and hollywood vampires interacting with lady patient
11. close of johnny depp
12. soundbite (english) alice cooper, recording artist - on their concert:
"well, tonight we're doing, we pay tribute to all of the guys that were our big brothers, jimi hendrix, jim morrison, john lennon, you know, keith moon, all of the guys that were our big brothers that passed away, so we're doing all of their songs tonight. it's sort of our tribute, our tip of the hat to the guys that taught us. and everybody up there is in bands now, big bands, but all our bands learned from their bands."
13. various of alice cooper placing hearing device in patient's ear
14. soundbite (english) alice cooper, recording artist: 
"in los angeles all of the guys used to meet at one place, one bar every night, the rainbow bar - and we drank all night. that was our drinking club. jim morrison passed away, jimi hendrix passed away, john lennon, keith moon, harry nilsson, t. rex, i mean all of these guys were hollywood vampires and they called us that because nobody ever saw us during the day (iaughs). they only saw us at night and all we ever did was drink so they kind of deemed us the hollywood vampires and then i talked to johnny depp then, i did a movie with johnny and i told him about this and johnny is a great guitar player and he said, "well, why don't we put a band together and honor all of our dead, drunk friends?' so we did and it worked and we connected up with, you know, with bill austin and it just seems to be a great partnership. we'll be doing many, many more of these."
15. alice cooper interacting with patient ++upsound++ "now unfortunately you will have to hear my music++
16. close of alice cooper with upsound, "dr. cooper is still here"
17. close of johnny depp with upsound, "he's the dr., i'm not (laughs.)"
18. mid of johnny depp talking with teenage patient while he is attended by dr. bill austin
19. close of dr. bill austin and joe perry 
20. johnny depp joking with teenage patient
21. soundbite (english) johnny depp, actor: 
"you know if you can make somebody smile in some way and help somebody that's everything, you know? thank you very much."
22. johnny depp hugging teenage patient
storyline:
while johnny depp's estranged wife amber heard was filing a restraining order against him, he and his hollywood vampires bandmates were in lisbon friday (27 may 2016) attending a starkey hearing foundation event ahead of a performance.
"you know if you can make somebody smile in some way and help somebody that's everything, you know?" said depp.
depp, alice cooper and joe perry helped fit hearing impaired patients with free hearing devices at the event, where they laughed and joked with patients.

snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp attends charity event in Lisbon during divorce drama
snippet.localized.description:
(27 May 2016) 
AP Entertainment
Lisbon, 27 May 2016
1. Close of Johnny Depp and Joe Perry entering the room, pull out to wide 
2. Close of Johnny Depp
3. Various of Johnny Depp interacting with elderly lady patient
4. Close of Alice Cooper and Joe Perry
5. Mid of Johnny Depp, Alice Cooper placing hearing device in lady's ear 
6. SOUNDBITE (English) Joe Perry, Recording Artist:
"I've lost a bit of hearing over the years you know because of what I do and I've been through this and I know what it's like to have the sound come back, you know, and it's like - it's incredible what Dr. Starkey does and to take part it's a privilege. It really is. It's a feeling that you don't get either way.
7. Close of Johnny Depp interacting with patient
8. Close of Alice Cooper
9. Mid of Bruce Witkin (left), Robert DeLeo (center) and Tommy Henriksen (right), members of Hollywood Vampires
10. Mid of Johnny Depp and Hollywood Vampires interacting with lady patient
11. Close of Johnny Depp
12. SOUNDBITE (English) Alice Cooper, Recording Artist - on their concert:
"Well, tonight we're doing, we pay tribute to all of the guys that were our big brothers, Jimi Hendrix, Jim Morrison, John Lennon, you know, Keith Moon, all of the guys that were our big brothers that passed away, so we're doing all of their songs tonight. It's sort of our tribute, our tip of the hat to the guys that taught us. And everybody up there is in bands now, big bands, but all our bands learned from their bands."
13. Various of Alice Cooper placing hearing device in patient's ear
14. SOUNDBITE (English) Alice Cooper, Recording Artist: 
"In Los Angeles all of the guys used to meet at one place, one bar every night, the Rainbow Bar - and we drank all night. That was our drinking club. Jim Morrison passed away, Jimi Hendrix passed away, John Lennon, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, T. Rex, I mean all of these guys were Hollywood vampires and they called us that because nobody ever saw us during the day (Iaughs). They only saw us at night and all we ever did was drink so they kind of deemed us the Hollywood vampires and then I talked to Johnny Depp then, I did a movie with Johnny and I told him about this and Johnny is a great guitar player and he said, "Well, why don't we put a band together and honor all of our dead, drunk friends?' So we did and it worked and we connected up with, you know, with Bill Austin and it just seems to be a great partnership. We'll be doing many, many more of these."
15. Alice Cooper interacting with patient ++UPSOUND++ "Now unfortunately you will have to hear my music++

22. Johnny Depp hugging teenage patient
STORYLINE:
While Johnny Depp's estranged wife Amber Heard was filing a restraining order against him, he and his Hollywood Vampires bandmates were in Lisbon Friday (27 MAY 2016) attending a Starkey Hearing Foundation event ahead of a performance.
"You know if you can make somebody smile in some way and help somebody that's everything, you know?" said Depp.
Depp, Alice Cooper and Joe Perry helped fit hearing impaired patients with free hearing devices at the event, where they laughed and joked with patients.

amber heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. people still didn’t believe her.
the divorce of amber heard and johnny depp is now final, and one thing’s for sure: heard didn’t get any money out of it.

she settled the divorce out of court for $7 million, all of which she has now donated to charitable causes. she’s splitting the sum between the american civil liberties union’s efforts to battle violence against women and the children’s hospital of los angeles, where she’s volunteered for the past 10 years.

Amber Heard did what abuse victims are “supposed” to do. People still didn’t believe her.
The divorce of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp is now final, and one thing’s for sure: Heard didn’t get any money out of it.

She settled the divorce out of court for $7 million, all of which she has now donated to charitable causes. She’s splitting the sum between the American Civil Liberties Union’s efforts to battle violence against women and the Children’s Hospital of Los Angeles, where she’s volunteered for the past 10 years.

And in a joint statement, both Heard and Depp affirmed that "neither party has made false accusations for financial gain."

snippet.title: amber heard wants bigger payout from johnny depp
snippet.description:
amber heard was granted 7 million dollars after splitting from johnny depp and promised she would be splitting the entire payout equally between two charities; the aclu which stops violence against women and the childrens hospital of los angeles

however, the 'danish girl' star thinks that depp should be paying more as he gets a tax deduction for sending the money to them directly.  ambers rep said in a statement, "if johnny wishes to change the settlement agreement, we must insist that he honour the full amount by donating 14 million dollars to charity, which after accounting for his tax deduction, is equal to his 7 million payment obligation to amber." 
the rep then added, "we would also insist that the full amount be paid immediately and not drawn out over many years".

a good deed on amber's part, but she had better be using the money purely for charity, because johnny depp fans are extremely upset.
snippet.tags: ['amber heard', 'Johnny depp', 'divorce', 'Danish girl', 'pirates of the Caribbean', '7 mil', 'charity', 'donation', 'ACLU']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Wants Bigger Payout From Johnny Depp
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard was granted 7 million dollars after splitting from Johnny Depp and promised she would be splitting the entire payout equally between two charities; the ACLU which stops violence against women and the Childrens Hospital of Los Angeles

However, the 'Danish Girl' star thinks that Depp should be paying more as he gets a tax deduction for sending the money to them directly.  Ambers rep said in a statement, "If Johnny wishes to change the settlement agreement, we must insist that he honour the full amount by donating 14 million dollars to charity, which after accounting for his tax deduction, is equal to his 7 million payment obligation to Amber." 
The rep then added, "We would also insist that the full amount be paid immediately and not drawn out over many years".

A good deed on Amber's part, but she had better be using the money purely for charity, because Johnny Depp fans are extremely upset.

snippet.title: amber heard slams johnny depp in court after he refuses to make good on their $6.8 million.
snippet.description:
amber heard slams johnny depp in court after he refuses to make good on their $6.8 million divorce settlement because she wrote an open letter about domestic violence.
the divorce settlement between johnny depp and amber heard has fallen apart, leaving the deal hanging by a thread, dailymail.com can exclusively reveal.
the $6.8million settlement was close to being finalized in the last few days but depp refused to pay the money at the 11th hour.
now, according to bombshell legal documents seen by dailymail.com, it appears the actor is stalling because he's furious over public comments his former wife has made about domestic violence in recent weeks.
depp, who paid an initial $100,000 to two charities, is holding back on paying heard the millions of dollars she has publicly vowed to donate to good causes.
heard has promised to give the american civil liberties union money for their work to stop violence against women, and the children's hospital los angeles will also receive a share.
but depp's stonewalling leaves both organizations wanting - effectively penalizing the people they help.
the legal paperwork, obtained exclusively by dailymail.com, reveals that because of the halt heard's legal team is hitting back with a formal 'request for order' to the judge in the case in the hope that it will force depp's hand once and for all.
in the documents filed with los angeles superior court, heard's lawyers have asked the judge to act against depp, 53, and enforce the terms of the settlement - known in the legal world as 'deal point memorandum'.
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'slams', 'Johnny Depp', 'REFUSES', 'make good', '$6.8 million', 'divorce', 'settlement', 'domestic violence']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard slams Johnny Depp in court after he REFUSES to make good on their $6.8 million.
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard slams Johnny Depp in court after he REFUSES to make good on their $6.8 million divorce settlement because she wrote an open letter about domestic violence.
The divorce settlement between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard has fallen apart, leaving the deal hanging by a thread, DailyMail.com can exclusively reveal.
The $6.8million settlement was close to being finalized in the last few days but Depp refused to pay the money at the 11th hour.
Now, according to bombshell legal documents seen by DailyMail.com, it appears the actor is stalling because he's furious over public comments his former wife has made about domestic violence in recent weeks.
Depp, who paid an initial $100,000 to two charities, is holding back on paying Heard the millions of dollars she has publicly vowed to donate to good causes.
Heard has promised to give the American Civil Liberties Union money for their work to stop violence against women, and the Children's Hospital Los Angeles will also receive a share.
But Depp's stonewalling leaves both organizations wanting - effectively penalizing the people they help.
The legal paperwork, obtained exclusively by DailyMail.com, reveals that because of the halt Heard's legal team is hitting back with a formal 'Request for Order' to the judge in the case in the hope that it will force Depp's hand once and for all.
In the documents filed with Los Angeles Superior Court, Heard's lawyers have asked the judge to act against Depp, 53, and enforce the terms of the settlement - known in the legal world as 'Deal Point Memorandum'.
contentDetails.caption: False

snippet.title: amber heard's lawyers defend her in lengthy statement: 'amber is the victim'
snippet.description:
amber heard‘s legal team, lead attorney samantha f. spector and co-counsel joseph p. koenig, just released a statement defending her and her actions throughout the past week in her allegations of domestic violence against johnny depp.

“as the result of amber’s decision to decline giving an initial statement to the lapd, her silence has been used against her by johnny’s team. amber did not provide a statement to the lapd in an attempt to protect her privacy and johnny’s career. johnny’s team has forced amber to give a statement to the lapd to set the record straight as to the true facts, as she cannot continue to leave herself open to the vicious false and malicious allegations that have infected the media. amber has suffered through years of physical and psychological abuse at the hands of johnny,” the statement, provided to just jared, began.

“in domestic violence cases, it is not unusual for the perpetrator’s playbook to include miscasting the victim as the villain,” the statement continued. “in reality, amber acted no differently than many victims of domestic violence, who think first of the harm that might come to the abuser, rather than the abuse they have already suffered. amber can no longer endure the relentless attacks and outright lies launched against her character in the court of public opinion since the tragic events of may 21st. with her statement amber hopes to give the lapd the opportunity to conduct an accurate and complete investigation into the events of that evening and before. if that occurs, and the truth is revealed, there is no doubt that amber’s claims will be substantiated beyond any doubt, and hopefully johnny will get the help that he so desperately needs.”

click inside to read the remainder of the statement from amber heard’s legal team…

from the beginning it has been amber’s desire to keep this matter as private as possible, even though lapd officers responded to a 911 call made by a third-party. the lapd officers viewed not only the disarray that johnny had caused in the apartment but also the physical injuries to amber’s face. we filed the petition for dissolution of marriage at the very end of the day on monday may 23rd and we did not serve johnny with the petition at the premiere of alice through the looking glass that evening. we sent a letter to johnny’s counsel team the next morning making it clear we wanted to keep this matter out of the media. we then held off requesting a domestic violence restraining order as we knew that johnny was out of the country.

we took the high road. unfortunately, johnny’s team immediately went to the press and began viciously attacking amber’s character. amber is simply a victim of domestic violence, and none of her actions are motivated by money. amber is a brave and financially independent woman who is showing the courage of her convictions by doing the right thing against johnny’s relentless army of lawyers and surrogates.

the family law court is not going to be influenced by misinformation placed in the social media based on anonymous sources. amber is the victim. amber is a hero.”
snippet.tags: ["Amber Heard's Lawyers Defend Her in Lengthy Statement", "'Amber Is the Victim'", "Amber Heard's Lawyers Defend Her in Lengthy Statement: 'Amber Is the Victim'", "amber heard's lawyers defending", "amber's lawyer", "Amber Heard's Lawyers Defend Her"]
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard's Lawyers Defend Her in Lengthy Statement: 'Amber Is the Victim'
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard‘s legal team, lead attorney Samantha F. Spector and co-counsel Joseph P. Koenig, just released a statement defending her and her actions throughout the past week in her allegations of domestic violence against Johnny Depp.

“As the result of Amber’s decision to decline giving an initial statement to the LAPD, her silence has been used against her by Johnny’s team. Amber did not provide a statement to the LAPD in an attempt to protect her privacy and Johnny’s career. Johnny’s team has forced Amber to give a statement to the LAPD to set the record straight as to the true facts, as she cannot continue to leave herself open to the vicious false and malicious allegations that have infected the media. Amber has suffered through years of physical and psychological abuse at the hands of Johnny,” the statement, provided to Just Jared, began.

“In domestic violence cases, it is not unusual for the perpetrator’s playbook to include miscasting the victim as the villain,” the statement continued. “In reality, Amber acted no differently than many victims of domestic violence, who think first of the harm that might come to the abuser, rather than the abuse they have already suffered. Amber can no longer endure the relentless attacks and outright lies launched against her character in the Court of Public Opinion since the tragic events of May 21st. With her statement Amber hopes to give the LAPD the opportunity to conduct an accurate and complete investigation into the events of that evening and before. If that occurs, and the truth is revealed, there is no doubt that Amber’s claims will be substantiated beyond any doubt, and hopefully Johnny will get the help that he so desperately needs.”

Click inside to read the remainder of the statement from Amber Heard’s legal team…

From the beginning it has been Amber’s desire to keep this matter as private as possible, even though LAPD officers responded to a 911 call made by a third-party. The LAPD officers viewed not only the disarray that Johnny had caused in the apartment but also the physical injuries to Amber’s face. We filed the Petition for Dissolution of Marriage at the very end of the day on Monday May 23rd and we did not serve Johnny with the Petition at the premiere of Alice Through the Looking Glass that evening. We sent a letter to Johnny’s counsel team the next morning making it clear we wanted to keep this matter out of the media. We then held off requesting a domestic violence restraining order as we knew that Johnny was out of the country.

We took the high road. Unfortunately, Johnny’s team immediately went to the press and began viciously attacking Amber’s character. Amber is simply a victim of domestic violence, and none of her actions are motivated by money. Amber is a brave and financially independent woman who is showing the courage of her convictions by doing the right thing against Johnny’s relentless army of lawyers and surrogates.

The Family Law Court is not going to be influenced by misinformation placed in the social media based on anonymous sources. Amber is the victim. Amber is a hero.”

K. Simmons, Amber Heard and Willem Dafoe. Justice League is scheduled to be released on November 17, 2017 in 2D, 3D and IMAX 3D.

snippet.title: amber heard and johnny depp divorce
snippet.description:
johnny depp and amber heard: a timeline of their tempestuous relationship

the divorce of amber heard and johnny depp is now final, and one thing’s for sure: heard didn’t get any money out of it.

she settled the divorce out of court for $7 million, all of which she has now donated to charitable causes. she’s splitting the sum between the american civil liberties union’s efforts to battle violence against women and the children’s hospital of los angeles, where she’s volunteered for the past 10 years.

and in a joint statement, both heard and depp affirmed that “neither party has made false accusations for financial gain.”

in other words: heard is not a gold digger, and she did not accuse depp of cutting off part of his finger and then using the stump to finger paint the words “easy amber” on a mirror because she thought that would be a cool quick way to make some cash.

it’s a shame heard felt the need to be so emphatic about the fact that she isn’t lying about her domestic violence claims, but it’s not surprising. ever since she first filed for a restraining order against depp in may, heard has done everything we say domestic abuse survivors should do. she went to the police. she provided copious documentation. she went above and beyond to prove she wasn’t in it for the money.
people still insisted she was lying.

after months of fighting, amber heard and johnny depp suddenly settled their divorce this week, with heard donating all of the settlement money to charity.

their relationship was a tabloid magazine’s dream: hollywood a-lister falls in love with up-and-coming ingenue on set. later, as allegations of abuse emerged, coverage of their relationship took a noticeably darker turn, with lurid reports — and later video and photos — of violent outbursts and alleged physical abuse.


here’s a look back at johnny and amber’s tempestuous relationship.


october 2009

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard and Johnny Depp divorce
snippet.localized.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard: A Timeline of Their Tempestuous Relationship

The divorce of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp is now final, and one thing’s for sure: Heard didn’t get any money out of it.

She settled the divorce out of court for $7 million, all of which she has now donated to charitable causes. She’s splitting the sum between the American Civil Liberties Union’s efforts to battle violence against women and the Children’s Hospital of Los Angeles, where she’s volunteered for the past 10 years.

And in a joint statement, both Heard and Depp affirmed that “neither party has made false accusations for financial gain.”

In other words: Heard is not a gold digger, and she did not accuse Depp of cutting off part of his finger and then using the stump to finger paint the words “Easy Amber” on a mirror because she thought that would be a cool quick way to make some cash.

It’s a shame Heard felt the need to be so emphatic about the fact that she isn’t lying about her domestic violence claims, but it’s not surprising. Ever since she first filed for a restraining order against Depp in May, Heard has done everything we say domestic abuse survivors should do. She went to the police. She provided copious documentation. She went above and beyond to prove she wasn’t in it for the money.
People still insisted she was lying.

After months of fighting, Amber Heard and Johnny Depp suddenly settled their divorce this week, with Heard donating all of the settlement money to charity.

Their relationship was a tabloid magazine’s dream: Hollywood A-lister falls in love with up-and-coming ingenue on set. Later, as allegations of abuse emerged, coverage of their relationship took a noticeably darker turn, with lurid reports — and later video and photos — of violent outbursts and alleged physical abuse.


Here’s a look back at Johnny and Amber’s tempestuous relationship.


October 2009

Depp and Heard met on the set of “The Rum Diary” with Depp playing a journalist obsessed with Heard’s character — a woman engaged to another man.

June 2012 

Depp and Heard started dating after the actor split from his long-time partner, Vanessa Paradis.

Jan. 17, 2014

People Magazine reported the couple was engaged.

April 7, 2014

Depp showed off his engagement ring during an interview with ET, stating, “It’s exciting to wear a girl’s ring … I don’t know, you know. It just fit.”

May 2014

A text message conversation retrieved by ET on June 1, 2016, reportedly showed Depp’s abusive behavior toward Heard in May of 2014.

Feb. 3, 2015

Depp and Heard tied the knot at the actor’s private island in the Bahamas.

snippet.localized.title: Disturbing Leaked Video Allegedly Shows Johnny Depp Fighting With Amber Heard
snippet.localized.description:
More trouble for Johnny Depp as a video emerges of him fighting with ex-Amber Heard. Sam, Brett, Grace, and Jason Carter discuss the video. Let us know what you think of the video.

"A new video emerged the day before Amber Heard was due to be deposed in her ongoing legal battle with estranged husband, Johnny Depp, of an alleged altercation between the two. 

In the video that TMZ first published Friday, Depp appears to be in a fit of rage over an unknown incident that occurred earlier in the day. He storms through the kitchen slamming cabinets, breaking objects and yelling expletives, all while interrogating Heard. 

“Nothing happened this morning, you know that?” she tells him. “I just woke up and you were so sweet and nice – we were not even fighting this morning. All I said was sorry.”

He then approaches Heard, who reportedly filmed the video that sources in Depp’s camp reportedly claim is “heavily edited,” to pour himself a large glass of wine. 

“You want to see crazy? I’ll give you crazy,” he says. “Here’s me – all your crazy.”

snippet.title: amber heard donates $7 million divorce settlement to charity
snippet.description:
actress amber heard said on thursday she is donating her $7 million divorce settlement from actor johnny depp to charity.

heard, 30, said in a statement that she is dividing the full settlement equally between the american civil liberties union, specifically to prevent violence against women, and the children’s hospital of los angeles.

“as described in the restraining order and divorce settlement, money played no role for me personally and never has, except to the extent that i could donate it to charity and, in doing so, hopefully help those less able to defend themselves,” the actress said.

depp’s representative did not immediately respond to requests for comment.

heard and depp, 53, privately settled their acrimonious divorce case on tuesday, a day ahead of a court hearing on the status of a restraining order the actress had obtained against her estranged husband.

the couple released a joint statement calling their relationship “intensely passionate and at times volatile but always bound by love,” adding that “there was never any intent of physical or emotional harm.”

the settlement ended the couple’s 15-month marriage after weeks of highly publicized claims of domestic violence by heard and counterclaims of financial blackmailing by depp.

depp, one of hollywood’s top actors and box-office draws with franchises such as “pirates of the caribbean,” married heard, known for “friday night lights,” in february 2015 after meeting on the set of the 2011 film “the rum diary.”

heard will be starring in warner bros’ upcoming “justice league” superhero film, while depp will reprise his lead role in the next “pirates of the caribbean” film.
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'Donates $7 Million', 'Divorce Settlement', 'Charity', 'Johnny Depp']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Donates $7 Million Divorce Settlement To Charity
snippet.localized.description:
Actress Amber Heard said on Thursday she is donating her $7 million divorce settlement from actor Johnny Depp to charity.

Heard, 30, said in a statement that she is dividing the full settlement equally between the American Civil Liberties Union, specifically to prevent violence against women, and the Children’s Hospital of Los Angeles.

“As described in the restraining order and divorce settlement, money played no role for me personally and never has, except to the extent that I could donate it to charity and, in doing so, hopefully help those less able to defend themselves,” the actress said.

Depp’s representative did not immediately respond to requests for comment.

Heard and Depp, 53, privately settled their acrimonious divorce case on Tuesday, a day ahead of a court hearing on the status of a restraining order the actress had obtained against her estranged husband.

The couple released a joint statement calling their relationship “intensely passionate and at times volatile but always bound by love,” adding that “there was never any intent of physical or emotional harm.”

The settlement ended the couple’s 15-month marriage after weeks of highly publicized claims of domestic violence by Heard and counterclaims of financial blackmailing by Depp.

Depp, one of Hollywood’s top actors and box-office draws with franchises such as “Pirates of the Caribbean,” married Heard, known for “Friday Night Lights,” in February 2015 after meeting on the set of the 2011 film “The Rum Diary.”

Heard will be starring in Warner Bros’ upcoming “Justice League” superhero film, while Depp will reprise his lead role in the next “Pirates of the Caribbean” film.

elon musk's rep denies he's dating amber heard

amber heard & elon musk date night: moving on from johnny depp? 

is amber heard dating elon musk now that she has left johnny depp?

elon musk & amber heard dating after johnny depp split? they're hanging out a lot

rumors swirl that amber heard is dating elon musk 


johnny depp's estranged wife amber heard and spacex billionaire elon musk 'are not dating .

according to a source, the beautiful actress spent the weekend at the delano south beach with the single-again tesla billionaire.

while those close to both musk and heard insist they are just friends, spies tell page six that, although they had separate rooms, musk was seen entering a specific room and the actress exiting the same room at different times over four days.

one witness said, “they were seen arriving to, and leaving, the same room many times, but always separately. he was seen going in at night and doing a ‘walk of shame’ in the morning.”

musk was in florida for the launch of a spacex rocket from cape canaveral, while heard was there for work, we’re told.

but sources close to both heard and musk insist they are friends and he allowed her to use his room while he was working on his rocket launch.

“i believe your sources are mistaken,” musk’s rep told us. “elon was in cape canaveral, florida, for a spacex rocket launch this weekend.” cape canaveral is three hours’ drive from miami, and musk posted tweets from the falcon launch on july 17 and 18. of his “walk of shame” the rep echoed, “don’t think that last bit is true, unfortunately.”


elon reeve musk (/ˈiːlɒn ˈmʌsk/; born june 28, 1971) is a south african-born canadian-american business magnate, investor[10][11] engineer[12] and inventor.[13][14][15][16]

he is the founder, ceo and cto of spacex; co-founder, ceo and product architect of tesla motors; co-founder and chairman of solarcity, co-chairman of openai; co-founder of zip2; and founder of x.com which merged with paypal of confinity.[17][18][19] as of june 2016, he has an estimated net worth of us$12.7 billion, making him the 83rd wealthiest person in the world.[20]

musk has stated that the goals of solarcity, tesla motors, and spacex revolve around his vision to change the world and humanity.[21] his goals include reducing global warming through sustainable energy production and consumption, and reducing the "risk of human extinction" by "making life multiplanetary"[22][23] by setting up a human colony on mars. music by tadros brothers:

Amber Heard & Elon Musk Date Night: Moving On From Johnny Depp? 

Is Amber Heard Dating Elon Musk Now That She Has Left Johnny Depp?

Elon Musk & Amber Heard Dating After Johnny Depp Split? They're Hanging Out A Lot

Rumors swirl that Amber Heard is dating Elon Musk 


Johnny Depp's estranged wife Amber Heard and SpaceX billionaire Elon Musk 'are not dating .

According to a source, the beautiful actress spent the weekend at the Delano South Beach with the single-again Tesla billionaire.

While those close to both Musk and Heard insist they are just friends, spies tell Page Six that, although they had separate rooms, Musk was seen entering a specific room and the actress exiting the same room at different times over four days.

One witness said, “They were seen arriving to, and leaving, the same room many times, but always separately. He was seen going in at night and doing a ‘walk of shame’ in the morning.”

Musk was in Florida for the launch of a SpaceX rocket from Cape Canaveral, while Heard was there for work, we’re told.

But sources close to both Heard and Musk insist they are friends and he allowed her to use his room while he was working on his rocket launch.

“I believe your sources are mistaken,” Musk’s rep told us. “Elon was in Cape Canaveral, Florida, for a SpaceX rocket launch this weekend.” Cape Canaveral is three hours’ drive from Miami, and Musk posted tweets from the Falcon launch on July 17 and 18. Of his “walk of shame” the rep echoed, “Don’t think that last bit is true, unfortunately.”


Elon Reeve Musk (/ˈiːlɒn ˈmʌsk/; born June 28, 1971) is a South African-born Canadian-American business magnate, investor[10][11] engineer[12] and inventor.[13][14][15][16]

He is the founder, CEO and CTO of SpaceX; co-founder, CEO and product architect of Tesla Motors; co-founder and chairman of SolarCity, co-chairman of OpenAI; co-founder of Zip2; and founder of X.com which merged with PayPal of Confinity.[17][18][19] As of June 2016, he has an estimated net worth of US$12.7 billion, making him the 83rd wealthiest person in the world.[20]

Musk has stated that the goals of SolarCity, Tesla Motors, and SpaceX revolve around his vision to change the world and humanity.[21] His goals include reducing global warming through sustainable energy production and consumption, and reducing the "risk of human extinction" by "making life multiplanetary"[22][23] by setting up a human colony on Mars. snippet.description:
amber was booked for domestic violence against former girlfriend in 2009
her mugshot was taken and she appeared in court the following day

highlights
amber was booked for domestic violence against former girlfriend in 2009
her mugshot was taken and she appeared in court the following day
amber considered herself married to tasya, before she married johnny
actress amber heard, who recently claimed she has been the victim of domestic violence by estranged husband johnny depp, was reportedly arrested on the same charge against her former girlfriend tasya van ree in 2009, it has emerged.

amber and tasva got into an argument on september 14, 2009 at seattle-tacoma international airport. she reportedly grabbed tasva's arm, was arrested and booked for misdemeanor and domestic violence, reported tmz.com

her mugshot was taken and she appeared in court the following day.

amber, 30, is currently suing johnny for divorce claiming that he was violent towards her and threw his iphone at her, bruising her face.

however, the prosecutor declined to take the case further but warned amber that she could reconsider and refile within the two-year statute of limitation period.

it was previously revealed that amber considered herself married to tasya, before she married johnny.

HIGHLIGHTS
Amber was booked for domestic violence against former girlfriend in 2009
Her mugshot was taken and she appeared in court the following day
Amber considered herself married to Tasya, before she married Johnny
Actress Amber Heard, who recently claimed she has been the victim of domestic violence by estranged husband Johnny Depp, was reportedly arrested on the same charge against her former girlfriend Tasya Van Ree in 2009, it has emerged.

Amber and Tasva got into an argument on September 14, 2009 at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. She reportedly grabbed Tasva's arm, was arrested and booked for misdemeanor and domestic violence, reported tmz.com

Her mugshot was taken and she appeared in court the following day.

Amber, 30, is currently suing Johnny for divorce claiming that he was violent towards her and threw his iPhone at her, bruising her face.

However, the prosecutor declined to take the case further but warned Amber that she could reconsider and refile within the two-year statute of limitation period.

It was previously revealed that Amber considered herself married to Tasya, before she married Johnny.

snippet.description:
amber heard is reportedly getting sued for $10 million for her part in an alleged conspiracy to sabotage the drama, london fields. a production company – nicola six – which is named after heard’s character in the film, sued amber along with the movie’s director for breach of contract because they refused to shoot the agreed upon script and failed to show up at the toronto international film festival to promote the film.

it appears amber heard has found herself in legal trouble.

according to reports, the actress is being sued for 10 million dollars for her part in an alleged conspiracy to sabotage the drama london fields. 

here’s what’s happening:

a production company – nicola six – which is named after heard’s character in the film, sued amber along with the movie’s director for breach of contract because they refused to shoot the agreed upon script and failed to show up at the toronto international film festival to promote the film. 

the suit reportedly claims that ‘while the inherent tension between actors and directors and producers are nothing new in hollywood, the unauthorized and unlawful acts of heard and others – notably their campaign to the picture and the picture’s investors – are perhaps unprecedented’.

it goes on to allege that heard refused to act in provocative scenes… meaning key scenes in the movie had to be removed or rewritten to accommodate her behavior.

there has been no response from amber.
