It appears Amber Heard has found herself in legal trouble.

According to reports, the actress is being sued for 10 million dollars for her part in an alleged conspiracy to sabotage the drama London Fields. 

Here’s what’s happening:

A production company – Nicola Six – which is named after Heard’s character in the film, sued Amber along with the movie’s director for breach of contract because they refused to shoot the agreed upon script and failed to show up at the Toronto International Film Festival to promote the film. 

The suit reportedly claims that ‘while the inherent tension between actors and directors and producers are nothing new in Hollywood, the unauthorized and unlawful acts of Heard and others – notably their campaign to the picture and the picture’s investors – are perhaps unprecedented’.

It goes on to allege that Heard refused to act in provocative scenes… meaning key scenes in the movie had to be removed or rewritten to accommodate her behavior.

There has been no response from Amber.

snippet.title: johnny depp / amber heard divorce getting violent?
snippet.description:
actress amber heard is accusing her husband, johnny depp, of assaulting her. she claimed that he threw a phone at her and she shows a picture of the a bruise on her face. cenk uygur, john iadarola, ben mankiewicz, and jimmy dore, hosts of the young turks, break it down. tell us what you think in the comment section below.

“amber heard has filed for a restraining order against johnny depp, her husband of just over a year, accusing him of repeated assaults. heard filed for divorce early this week and, tmz reports, arrived in court on friday with facial bruises and abrasions that depp had allegedly inflicted.

a source told people that this was “only the latest incident” in a pattern of depp’s abuse.

heard says that depp hit her face with his iphone on saturday. from tmz:

amber claims during the alleged attack, johnny shattered various objects in the apartment. she says she was on the phone with a friend during the fight, and when johnny grabbed her phone she screamed to her friend, “call the cops!” the friend called 911 and cops came to the residence. amber says when cops arrived johnny had already fled, so they took a report.

we're told cops told amber they would find johnny and arrest him if she gave a statement about the alleged violence, but she refused. officers told her if she changed her mind she could call them.”

snippet.title: amber heard to donate $7 million depp divorce settlement to charities
snippet.description:
amber heard to donate $7 million depp divorce settlement to charities

amber heard is to give her $7 million divorce settlement from johnny depp to a charity that supports victims of domestic violence and a children’s hospital.

heard wrote in a statement released on thursday that the entire settlement would be split between the american civil liberties union (aclu) and the children’s hospital los angeles, with the aclu’s share of $3.5m going specifically towards its efforts to combat violence against women.

she and depp settled their contentious divorce on tuesday, one day before the actors were scheduled to begin a restraining order hearing that would center on heard’s allegations depp repeatedly abused her during their marriage.

depp denied he abused heard, and his attorney alleged she was making the domestic violence allegations to obtain a more favorable settlement.

court filings show heard had initially requested $50,000 a month in spousal support, which was denied by the judge.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard To Donate $7 Million Depp Divorce Settlement To Charities
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard To Donate $7 Million Depp Divorce Settlement To Charities

Amber Heard is to give her $7 million divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to a charity that supports victims of domestic violence and a children’s hospital.

Heard wrote in a statement released on Thursday that the entire settlement would be split between the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) and the Children’s Hospital Los Angeles, with the ACLU’s share of $3.5m going specifically towards its efforts to combat violence against women.

She and Depp settled their contentious divorce on Tuesday, one day before the actors were scheduled to begin a restraining order hearing that would center on Heard’s allegations Depp repeatedly abused her during their marriage.

Depp denied he abused Heard, and his attorney alleged she was making the domestic violence allegations to obtain a more favorable settlement.

Court filings show Heard had initially requested $50,000 a month in spousal support, which was denied by the judge.

i've been meaning to do a #blackcat trailer for a while but nothing seemed to work. she's a favourite #spiderman villain of mine and could easily have her own netflix series thanks to her ties to kingpin and the defenders... after revisiting and revamping, with some new material, i finally managed to complete the project! i hope you like it (and her) as much as i do.

the plot would be:
like in the comics, her father's a master thief. she follows suit and her criminal activity peaks interest from the kingpin. after various cat-and-mouse pursuit that sees her captured, she makes a deal to undergo experimentation (gaining her famous 'bad luck' powers).the finale would see her attempt to bring down the kingpin with these new abilities, regaining her freedom in the process.

black cat/felicia hardy - amber heard
kingpin/wilson fisk - vincent d'onofrio
spider-man/peter parker - i only included a costumed clip so it could basically be anybody... we don't need to see his face anyway.


check out my other trailers and subscribe for more.

enjoy!

snippet.localized.title: Marvel's THE BLACK CAT Trailer Concept - Netflix | Amber Heard, Vincent D'Onofrio
snippet.localized.description:
Non-profit, FAN-MADE trailer. No copyright infringement intended.

I've been meaning to do a #BlackCat trailer for a while but nothing seemed to work. She's a favourite #SpiderMan villain of mine and could easily have her own Netflix series thanks to her ties to Kingpin and the Defenders... After revisiting and revamping, with some new material, I finally managed to complete the project! I hope you like it (and her) as much as I do.

The plot would be:
Like in the comics, her father's a master thief. She follows suit and her criminal activity peaks interest from the Kingpin. After various cat-and-mouse pursuit that sees her captured, she makes a deal to undergo experimentation (gaining her famous 'bad luck' powers).The finale would see her attempt to bring down the Kingpin with these new abilities, regaining her freedom in the process.

Black Cat/Felicia Hardy - Amber Heard
Kingpin/Wilson Fisk - Vincent D'Onofrio
Spider-Man/Peter Parker - I only included a costumed clip so it could basically be anybody... we don't need to see his face anyway.


Check out my other trailers and subscribe for more.

Enjoy!

johnny depp’s estranged wife, amber heard, has now released text messages between herself and depp’s assistant to prove depp engaged in a pattern of physical abuse against her. we discuss the text messages and what heard stands to gain in spousal support with defense attorney mike cavalluzzi. we also take a look at the conviction of  “the shield” actor, michael jace who was convicted of second degree murder in the shooting death of his wife in front of the couple’s two young sons, as well as the controversial arrest of a bronx cabbie who killed a man for trying to rape his wife. we take a closer look at canadian real estate heir, blake leibel’s insanity plea and whether or not the da will ask for the death penalty? lastly, we’ll delve into whether child pornography charges are appropriate when a 14-year-old boy films a sex act and distributes that video in a middle school to his friends in this episode of crime time hosted by allison hope weiner.

snippet.title: johnny depp's wife amber heard avoids jail in australian dog smuggling case
snippet.description:
actor johnny depp's wife amber heard has avoided jail after pleading guilty to providing a false immigration document amid allegations she smuggled the couple's dogs into australia.
prosecutors in queensland state dropped two more serious charges that heard illegally imported the yorkshire terriers, pistol and boo, into the country last year, when depp was filming the fifth movie in the pirates of the caribbean series.
a conviction on the illegal importation counts could have sent the actress to prison for up to 10 years.
the false documents charge carries a maximum penalty of a year in jail and a fine of more than 10,000 australian dollars (£5,385).
but magistrate bernadette callaghan sentenced heard instead to a one month good behaviour bond. she will have to pay a 1,000 australian dollars fine (£541) if she violates the conditions of the bond over the next month.
the couple was swarmed by reporters when they arrived at court on monday.

snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp's wife Amber Heard avoids jail in Australian dog smuggling case
snippet.localized.description:
Actor Johnny Depp's wife Amber Heard has avoided jail after pleading guilty to providing a false immigration document amid allegations she smuggled the couple's dogs into Australia.
Prosecutors in Queensland state dropped two more serious charges that Heard illegally imported the Yorkshire terriers, Pistol and Boo, into the country last year, when Depp was filming the fifth movie in the Pirates Of The Caribbean series.
A conviction on the illegal importation counts could have sent the actress to prison for up to 10 years.
The false documents charge carries a maximum penalty of a year in jail and a fine of more than 10,000 Australian dollars (£5,385).
But magistrate Bernadette Callaghan sentenced Heard instead to a one month good behaviour bond. She will have to pay a 1,000 Australian dollars fine (£541) if she violates the conditions of the bond over the next month.
The couple was swarmed by reporters when they arrived at court on Monday.

snippet.title: amber heard, james franco and pamela romanowsky on ‘the adderall diaries’ and ‘the diaster artist’
snippet.description:
opening friday in limited release and vod is the feature debut from writer-director pamela romanowsky, the adderall diaries. based on the bestselling memoir by stephen elliott, the film stars james franco as a has-been author whose fascination with a high-profile murder case leads him to his own troubled past. when stephen uses his new-found obsession with the case to avoid his personal troubles, he finds it unexpectedly brings him romance with the trial reporter lana edmond (amber heard) while forcing him to confront old issues with his abusive father (ed harris). the film also stars christian slater, cynthia nixon, jim parrack and wilmer valderrama.

at the recent los angeles press day i landed an exclusive interview with amber heard, james franco and pamela romanowsky. they talked about how the theme of memory impacts the story and characters, the way they like to work on set, what they collect, their go-to karaoke songs, and more. in addition, franco teases the disaster artist and when fans might see the first footage. check out what they had to say above.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard, James Franco and Pamela Romanowsky on ‘The Adderall Diaries’ and ‘The Diaster Artist’
snippet.localized.description:
Opening Friday in limited release and VOD is the feature debut from writer-director Pamela Romanowsky, The Adderall Diaries. Based on the bestselling memoir by Stephen Elliott, the film stars James Franco as a has-been author whose fascination with a high-profile murder case leads him to his own troubled past. When Stephen uses his new-found obsession with the case to avoid his personal troubles, he finds it unexpectedly brings him romance with the trial reporter Lana Edmond (Amber Heard) while forcing him to confront old issues with his abusive father (Ed Harris). The film also stars Christian Slater, Cynthia Nixon, Jim Parrack and Wilmer Valderrama.

At the recent Los Angeles press day I landed an exclusive interview with Amber Heard, James Franco and Pamela Romanowsky. They talked about how the theme of memory impacts the story and characters, the way they like to work on set, what they collect, their go-to karaoke songs, and more. In addition, Franco teases The Disaster Artist and when fans might see the first footage. Check out what they had to say above.

snippet.title: the adderall diaries official trailer 2016  amber heard, james franco, ed harris movie hd
snippet.description:
the adderall diaries official trailer 2016  amber heard, james franco, ed harris movie hd

storyline   -----------   the adderall diaries

as a writer stymied by past success, writers block, substance abuse, relationship problems and a serious set of father issues, elliott's cracked-out chronicle of a bizarre murder trial amounts to less than the sum of its parts. not long into the 2007 trial of programmer hans reiser, accused of murdering his wife, the defendant's friend sean sturgeon obliquely confessed to several murders (though not the murder of reiser's wife). elliott, caught up in the film-ready twist and his tenuous connection to sturgeon (they share a bdsm social circle), makes a gonzo record of the proceedings. the result is a scattered, self-indulgent romp through the mind of a depressive narcissist obsessed with his insecurities and childhood traumas.

director: pamela romanowsky
writers: pamela romanowsky, stephen elliott (based on the book by)
stars: amber heard, james franco, ed harris

snippet.title: amber heard says she's donating $7m depp divorce settlement
snippet.description:
(19 aug 2016) amber heard says she's donating depp divorce settlement
amber heard says she is donating her entire $7 million divorce settlement from johnny depp to a pair of charities.
heard writes in a statement released thursday (18 aug. 2016) that the money will be split between the american civil liberties union and the children's hospital los angeles. heard says the money to the aclu is being given to help its efforts to combat violence against women.
heard and depp settled their contentious divorce on tuesday, one day before the actors were scheduled to begin a restraining order hearing that would center on heard's allegations depp repeatedly abused her during their marriage.
depp denied he abused heard.
heard writes that she knows the organizations will put the money to good use, and she plans to support them with future donations.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard says she's donating $7m Depp divorce settlement
snippet.localized.description:
(19 Aug 2016) AMBER HEARD SAYS SHE'S DONATING DEPP DIVORCE SETTLEMENT
Amber Heard says she is donating her entire $7 million divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to a pair of charities.
Heard writes in a statement released Thursday (18 AUG. 2016) that the money will be split between the American Civil Liberties Union and the Children's Hospital Los Angeles. Heard says the money to the ACLU is being given to help its efforts to combat violence against women.
Heard and Depp settled their contentious divorce on Tuesday, one day before the actors were scheduled to begin a restraining order hearing that would center on Heard's allegations Depp repeatedly abused her during their marriage.
Depp denied he abused Heard.
Heard writes that she knows the organizations will put the money to good use, and she plans to support them with future donations.

Now in its eighth season, The Doctors celebrity guests have included Academy Award Winners Sally Field, Barbra Streisand, Jane Fonda, Marcia Gay Harden, Kathy Bates and Marisa Tomei; reality stars from Teen Mom and The Real Housewives, as well as Kris Jenner, Caitlyn Jenner, Melissa Rivers, Sharon Osbourne, Tim Gunn and Amber Rose; actors Jessica Alba, Christina Applegate, Julie Bowen, Patricia Heaton, Chevy Chase, Kristin Davis, Lou Ferrigno, Harrison Ford, Grace Gealey, Cedric the Entertainer, Valerie Harper, Debra Messing, Chris O’Donnell, Betty White, Linda Gray, Fran Drescher, Emmy Rossum, Roseanne Barr, Valerie Bertinelli, Suzanne Somers; athletes Magic Johnson, Apolo Ohno and Danica Patrick; musicians Tim McGraw, Justin Bieber, Clint Black, LL Cool J,  Nick Carter, Kristin Chenoweth, Paula Abdul, Gloria Gaynor, La Toya Jackson, Barry Manilow, Bret Michaels, Gene Simmons and Jordin Sparks; and celebrity chefs Wolfgang Puck, Guy Fieri and Curtis Stone.

snippet.title: amber heard & johnny depp settle divorce & domestic violence case, release statement
snippet.description:
amber heard and johnny depp have reportedly settled their divorce case, his rep confirms to just jared.

the 30-year-old actress has also dismissed her domestic violence restraining order petition due to the case being settled. the pair withdrew legal documents on tuesday (august 16) for the domestic violence case, which was tied into the divorce case.

johnny is reportedly paying amber $7 million plus her legal fees.

“our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love. neither party has made false accusations for financial gains. there was never an intent of physical or emotional harm. amber wishes the best for johnny in the future. amber will be donating financial proceeds from the divorce to a charity,” a joint statement read.

“Our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love. Neither party has made false accusations for financial gains. snippet.title: amber heard donating entire divorce settlement
snippet.description:
just days after amber heard and johnny depp reached an agreement in their divorce, the actress now claims to have plans on putting her entire 7 million dollar settlement to donation...
...amber explains that her donation will be divided equally between the aclu, with a particular focus to stop violence against women, and the children's hospital of los angeles, where she has worked as a volunteer for the past 10 years alongside organizations like the art of elysium. lets hope she sticks to her word!
the voice's 11th season doesn't begin until september 19th 2016, but fans will get to see a sneak peek of the new coaches in action much earlier than that on nbc on august 21st, 2016. miley cyrus and alicia keys will be coaching for season 11 and word has it that the two have become 'best buds' to each other. the sneak peak also covers performances by miley and alicia themselves and fans are super-psyched!
90s kids, prepare for two of your dreams merged into one. the new kids on the block boyband will be guest starring in fuller house season 2! an epic blast from the past! in addition to that, fans can expect more surprises in season 2 with several other guest stars from old 90s sitcoms. fuller house season 2 is set to premier later this 2016.
snippet.tags: ['amber heard', 'Johnny depp', 'pirates of the Caribbean', 'the voice', 'miley cyrus', 'Alicia keys', 'full house', 'fuller house', 'fuller house season 2', 'new kids on the block', 'nkotb']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Donating Entire Divorce Settlement
snippet.localized.description:
Just days after Amber Heard and Johnny Depp reached an agreement in their divorce, the actress now claims to have plans on putting her entire 7 million dollar settlement to donation...
...Amber explains that her donation will be divided equally between the ACLU, with a particular focus to stop violence against women, and the Children's Hospital of Los Angeles, where she has worked as a volunteer for the past 10 years alongside organizations like the Art of Elysium. Lets hope she sticks to her word!
The Voice's 11th season doesn't begin until September 19th 2016, but fans will get to see a sneak peek of the new coaches in action much earlier than that on NBC on August 21st, 2016. Miley Cyrus and Alicia Keys will be coaching for season 11 and word has it that the two have become 'best buds' to each other. The sneak peak also covers performances by Miley and Alicia themselves and fans are super-psyched!
90s kids, prepare for two of your dreams merged into one. The New Kids On The Block boyband will be guest starring in Fuller House season 2! An epic blast from the past! In addition to that, fans can expect more surprises in season 2 with several other guest stars from old 90s sitcoms. Fuller House season 2 is set to premier later this 2016.

ohnny depp is perhaps one of the most versatile actors of his day and age in hollywood. he was born john christopher depp ii in owensboro, kentucky, on june 9, 1963, to betty sue (wells), who worked as a waitress, and john christopher depp, a civil engineer. depp was raised in florida. he dropped out of school when he was 15, and fronted a series of music-garage bands, including one named 'the kids'. however, it was when he married lori anne allison (lori a. depp) that he took up the job of being a ballpoint-pen salesman to support himself and his wife.

snippet.description:
first picture of amber heard in justice league as mera queen - johnny depp

the first picture of amber heard in justice league has been released.

amber, 30, will play mera queen of atlantis in the new dc comics superhero flick.


not only does she get to be in charge of a watery kingdom, she’s also the on-screen wife of jason momoa’s aquaman.

the film also stars ben affleck as batman, henry cavill as superman, gal gadot as wonder woman, ezra fisher as the flash, ray fisher as cyborg, and j.k. simmons as commissioner gordon.

while it’s thought amber will have just a supporting role in justice league, she’s expected to feature more prominently in 2018’s standalone aquaman movie, which will be directed by james wan – the brains behind saw, insidious, the conjuring and furious 7.

mera first appeared in aquaman no. 11 back in 1963, but it wasn’t until 2009 she was made more of a main player in the dc universe.

snippet.localized.title: First picture of Amber Heard in Justice League as Mera Queen - johnny depp
snippet.localized.description:
First picture of Amber Heard in Justice League as Mera Queen - johnny depp

THE FIRST picture of Amber Heard in Justice League has been released.

Amber, 30, will play Mera Queen of Atlantis in the new DC Comics superhero flick.


Not only does she get to be in charge of a watery kingdom, she’s also the on-screen wife of Jason Momoa’s Aquaman.

The film also stars Ben Affleck as Batman, Henry Cavill as Superman, Gal Gadot as Wonder Woman, Ezra Fisher as the Flash, Ray Fisher as Cyborg, and J.K. Simmons as Commissioner Gordon.

While it’s thought Amber will have just a supporting role in Justice League, she’s expected to feature more prominently in 2018’s standalone Aquaman movie, which will be directed by James Wan – the brains behind Saw, Insidious, The Conjuring and Furious 7.

Mera first appeared in Aquaman No. 11 back in 1963, but it wasn’t until 2009 she was made more of a main player in the DC Universe.

the innovation engine: a look inside emc’s emerging technologies division | #emcworld

by amber johnson | may 4, 2016

within every company lives the driving edge of its future product line. for emc, this division is called the emerging technologies division (etd). sam grocott, svp of marketing and product management at emc’s etd, explained that his division is mostly comprised of 1.0 or 2.0 products, with the exception of the isilon business unit, which is on its 8th generation.

grocott explained that etd exists within emc to orchestrate the opportunity for two things: innovation and growth. “that’s what we are judged on; it’s what we are measured against,” he said. grocott sat down with john furrier (@furrier) and dave vellante (@dvellante), cohosts of thecube, from siliconangle media team, during emc world 2016 in las vegas.

grocott mentioned emc’s dssd products, scaleio, elastic cloud storage (ecs), vipr, and the new vce vxrack system 1000 with neutrino nodes (announced may 3) as part of etd’s enterprise product repertoire. he also called etd’s product line “a family of four products”: vipr controller, ecs software-defined object storage system, scaleio software-defined block storage system, and isilonsd edge.

making vipr simpler

when asked about vipr’s initial release, grocott stated, “we confused the market,” but “we heard the feedback from customers. … we tried to glom too much into the vipr system, so what we decided to do was make it simpler.” etd focused vipr on the “controller aspect” and open-sourced the core ip in project coprhd (copperhead).

emc announced on may 2 it would release vipr 3.0, which will feature all of copperhead’s “up to 50 different arrays of storage,” according to grocott. thus, etd has worked toward “a truly heterogeneous environment.” grocott remarked that “simplification, automation, ease of use” is “absolutely what vipr is focused on.”

The innovation engine: A look inside EMC’s Emerging Technologies Division | #emcworld

by Amber Johnson | May 4, 2016

Within every company lives the driving edge of its future product line. For EMC, this division is called the Emerging Technologies Division (ETD). Sam Grocott, SVP of marketing and product management at EMC’s ETD, explained that his division is mostly comprised of 1.0 or 2.0 products, with the exception of the Isilon Business Unit, which is on its 8th generation.

Grocott explained that ETD exists within EMC to orchestrate the opportunity for two things: innovation and growth. “That’s what we are judged on; it’s what we are measured against,” he said. Grocott sat down with John Furrier (@furrier) and Dave Vellante (@dvellante), cohosts of theCUBE, from SiliconANGLE Media team, during EMC World 2016 in Las Vegas.

Grocott mentioned EMC’s DSSD products, ScaleIO, Elastic Cloud Storage (ECS), ViPR, and the new VCE VxRack System 1000 with Neutrino Nodes (announced May 3) as part of ETD’s enterprise product repertoire. He also called ETD’s product line “a family of four products”: ViPR Controller, ECS software-defined object storage system, ScaleIO software-defined block storage system, and IsilonSD Edge.

Making ViPR simpler

When asked about ViPR’s initial release, Grocott stated, “We confused the market,” but “we heard the feedback from customers. … We tried to glom too much into the ViPR system, so what we decided to do was make it simpler.” ETD focused ViPR on the “controller aspect” and open-sourced the core IP in Project CoprHD (copperhead).

EMC announced on May 2 it would release ViPR 3.0, which will feature all of Copperhead’s “up to 50 different arrays of storage,” according to Grocott. Thus, ETD has worked toward “a truly heterogeneous environment.” Grocott remarked that “simplification, automation, ease of use” is “absolutely what ViPR is focused on.”

snippet.title: amber heard tears up during domestic violence psa
snippet.description:
amber heard is opening up about her experience with domestic violence in a new psa for #girlgaze project.

the 30-year-old actress, who was involved in an intense domestic violence case with her ex johnny depp earlier this year, shared some of her personal story.

“i guess there was a lot of shame attached to that, the label of victim. it happens to so many women you know, when it happens in your home behind closed doors with someone you love it’s not straightforward…if a stranger did this it would be a no brainer,” she explained.

amber added, “just as a woman having gone through this in the public stage, in the public arena that i did it, i have a unique opportunity to remind other women this doesn’t have to be the way it is, you don’t have to do it alone, you’re not alone. we can change this.”
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'Tears Up During', 'Domestic Violence PSA']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Tears Up During Domestic Violence PSA
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard is opening up about her experience with domestic violence in a new PSA for #GirlGaze Project.

The 30-year-old actress, who was involved in an intense domestic violence case with her ex Johnny Depp earlier this year, shared some of her personal story.

“I guess there was a lot of shame attached to that, the label of victim. It happens to so many women you know, when it happens in your home behind closed doors with someone you love it’s not straightforward…If a stranger did this it would be a no brainer,” she explained.

Amber added, “Just as a woman having gone through this in the public stage, in the public arena that I did it, I have a unique opportunity to remind other women this doesn’t have to be the way it is, you don’t have to do it alone, you’re not alone. We can change this.”

snippet.description:
amber heard claims to be the victim of domestic violence in her marriage with johnny depp and she has filed for a restraining order against her estranged husband.

the 30-year-old actress reportedly showed up to court on friday (may 27) with a bruise on her face, according to tmz.

amber claims that johnny “physically assaulted her” and that she is the “victim of repeated domestic violence” throughout their marriage. she says she needs the temporary restraining order as there’s an “immediate threat of harm.”

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Claims Domestic Violence with Johnny Depp, Files for Restraining Order
snippet.localized.description:
Amber Heard claims to be the victim of domestic violence in her marriage with Johnny Depp and she has filed for a restraining order against her estranged husband.

The 30-year-old actress reportedly showed up to court on Friday (May 27) with a bruise on her face, according to TMZ.

Amber claims that Johnny “physically assaulted her” and that she is the “victim of repeated domestic violence” throughout their marriage. She says she needs the temporary restraining order as there’s an “immediate threat of harm.”
Johnny broke his silence on his divorce from Amber in a statement via his rep.

snippet.title: amber heard and johnny depp settle divorce case
snippet.description:
subscribe: https://goo.gl/p4ncmj
amber heard and johnny depp filed legal documents to end their divorce case on tuesday (aug. 16, 2016) wherein heard withdrew her request for a domestic violence restraining order petition against her estranged husband.

tmz reports that heard dismissed the case with prejudice just one day before their scheduled restraining order hearing, which means that she can never file the case again. sources told the tabloid that depp’s and heard’s legal teams came together to craft a settlement after heard was deposed on saturday (aug. 13). the couple released a joint statement following the settlement.

“our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love. neither party has made false accusations for financial gains,” the statement reads. “there was never an intent of physical or emotional harm. amber wishes the best for johnny in the future. amber will be donating financial proceeds from the divorce to a charity.”

according to inside sources, depp agreed to pay heard $7 million, including attorneys’ fees, to dismiss the case.

snippet.tags: ['iKnowgossip', 'Latest News', 'latest', 'Hollywood Gossip', '#gossip', '#celebrity', 'Celebrity news', '#moviestars', 'CELEBRITIES', 'CELEBRITY NUDES', 'NUDES PHOTOGRAPHY', 'POP STAR', '#justin bieber', '#grooming', 'Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Settle Divorce Case', 'amber heard johnny depp', 'amber heard video', '#johnnydepp', 'Amber Heard', 'Johnny Depp', '#Trending', 'amber heard and johnny depp wedding', 'amber heard and johnny depp interview', 'amber heard and johnny depp apology', 'amber heard and johnny depp divorce']
snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Settle Divorce Case
snippet.localized.description:
Subscribe: https://goo.gl/p4NCmj
Amber Heard and Johnny Depp filed legal documents to end their divorce case on Tuesday (Aug. 16, 2016) wherein Heard withdrew her request for a domestic violence restraining order petition against her estranged husband.

TMZ reports that Heard dismissed the case with prejudice just one day before their scheduled restraining order hearing, which means that she can never file the case again. Sources told the tabloid that Depp’s and Heard’s legal teams came together to craft a settlement after Heard was deposed on Saturday (Aug. 13). The couple released a joint statement following the settlement.

“Our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love. Neither party has made false accusations for financial gains,” the statement reads. “There was never an intent of physical or emotional harm. Amber wishes the best for Johnny in the future. Amber will be donating financial proceeds from the divorce to a charity.”

According to inside sources, Depp agreed to pay Heard $7 million, including attorneys’ fees, to dismiss the case.

Did Amber Heard seriously think no one would look into this? 

Remember when Amber made a statement saying that she would donate the $7 million dollars she won in her divorce settlement with Johnny Depp to Children’s Hospital and the ACLU? Well according to TMZ, the charities haven’t seen a dime.

snippet.title: amber heard spending time with elon musk
snippet.description:
there may be electricity flying between amber heard and billionaire elon musk amid the actress' high profile and nasty divorce from johnny depp.

the 30-year-old starlet is reportedly "spending time" with the mogul behind tesla motors and spacex, tmz reported thursday.

musk, who is also going through a divorce, and heard have apparently been friends for years and have been seeing each other more in the last few months, according to the gossip site.

two weeks ago they allegedly enjoyed a dinner date and last weekend, heard and her sister hung out in musk's hotel in miami.

reps for the stars did not immediately return the news request for comment.

heard filed for divorce from the "pirates of the caribbean star" in late may — three days after his mom, betty sue palmer, died.

four days later, the "danish girl" star appeared in court bearing a visible bruise on her face and alleged a history of domestic abuse throughout their 15 month marriage.

she was granted a temporary restraining order against the actor.

meanwhile, musk's wife, actress talulah riley, filed for divorce in late march. riley had first filed to end the marriage in 2012 but the rocky pair remarried in 2013.

a year later, it was musk,45, who wanted out, filing for divorce on new year's eve 2014. the papers were dismissed six months later.

amber and elon have been friends for several years, according to tmz, but since her split with johnny, “they’ve been spending a lot of time together.”


“just last weekend, amber and her sister were hanging out in elon’s hotel bungalow in miami. she had a 1-on-1 dinner at his l.a. house 2 weeks ago. she recently went to elon’s l.a. area office to spend time with him. and he’s paid several visits to her home,” a source told the news site.

at this time, no one in amber’s circle is calling it “dating,” but their extra time together seems super suspicious.

interestingly, elon is also going through a divorce. his ex filed in march after they got married for a second time. elon is worth an estimated $12.7 billion.

as you’ll recall, amber filed for divorce and got a restraining order against the edward scissorhands actor earlier this year, when she accused him of physically abusing her on a number of occasions. he has denied these claims, and their divorce is still pending.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard spending time with Elon Musk
snippet.localized.description:
There may be electricity flying between Amber Heard and billionaire Elon Musk amid the actress' high profile and nasty divorce from Johnny Depp.

The 30-year-old starlet is reportedly "spending time" with the mogul behind Tesla Motors and SpaceX, TMZ reported Thursday.

Musk, who is also going through a divorce, and Heard have apparently been friends for years and have been seeing each other more in the last few months, according to the gossip site.

Two weeks ago they allegedly enjoyed a dinner date and last weekend, Heard and her sister hung out in Musk's hotel in Miami.

Reps for the stars did not immediately return the News request for comment.

Heard filed for divorce from the "Pirates of the Caribbean Star" in late May — three days after his mom, Betty Sue Palmer, died.

Four days later, the "Danish Girl" star appeared in court bearing a visible bruise on her face and alleged a history of domestic abuse throughout their 15 month marriage.

She was granted a temporary restraining order against the actor.

Meanwhile, Musk's wife, actress Talulah Riley, filed for divorce in late March. Riley had first filed to end the marriage in 2012 but the rocky pair remarried in 2013.

A year later, it was Musk,45, who wanted out, filing for divorce on New Year's Eve 2014. The papers were dismissed six months later.

Amber and Elon have been friends for several years, according to TMZ, but since her split with Johnny, “they’ve been spending a lot of time together.”


“Just last weekend, Amber and her sister were hanging out in Elon’s hotel bungalow in Miami. She had a 1-on-1 dinner at his L.A. house 2 weeks ago. She recently went to Elon’s L.A. area office to spend time with him. And he’s paid several visits to her home,” a source told the news site.

At this time, no one in Amber’s circle is calling it “dating,” but their extra time together seems super suspicious.

Interestingly, Elon is also going through a divorce. His ex filed in March after they got married for a second time. Elon is worth an estimated $12.7 billion.

As you’ll recall, Amber filed for divorce and got a restraining order against the Edward Scissorhands actor earlier this year, when she accused him of physically abusing her on a number of occasions. He has denied these claims, and their divorce is still pending.

snippet.title: amber heard gives johnny depp's $7m divorce settlement to two charities
snippet.description:
http://www.bbc.com/news/entertainment-arts-37129062
amber heard is to donate her $7m (£5.3m) divorce settlement from johnny depp to two charities that work with abused women and ill children.
heard will give half to the american civil liberties union (aclu) to prevent violence against women, and half to the children's hospital of los angeles.
the actress said she hoped to "help those less able to defend themselves".
she earlier accused depp of striking her and throwing a mobile phone during a fight. he denied the allegations.
'money played no role'
depp's lawyer claimed she had made the accusations in order to obtain a more favourable settlement.
announcing their divorce settlement on tuesday, the pair said their relationship was "intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love".
in a statement, heard said: "money played no role for me personally and never has, except to the extent that i could donate it to charity and, in doing so, hopefully help those less able to defend themselves.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard gives Johnny Depp's $7m divorce settlement to two charities
snippet.localized.description:
http://www.bbc.com/news/entertainment-arts-37129062
Amber Heard is to donate her $7m (£5.3m) divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to two charities that work with abused women and ill children.
Heard will give half to the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) to prevent violence against women, and half to the Children's Hospital of Los Angeles.
The actress said she hoped to "help those less able to defend themselves".
She earlier accused Depp of striking her and throwing a mobile phone during a fight. He denied the allegations.
'Money played no role'
Depp's lawyer claimed she had made the accusations in order to obtain a more favourable settlement.
Announcing their divorce settlement on Tuesday, the pair said their relationship was "intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love".
In a statement, Heard said: "Money played no role for me personally and never has, except to the extent that I could donate it to charity and, in doing so, hopefully help those less able to defend themselves.

snippet.title: amber heard reveals new photos of alleged abuse by johnny depp
snippet.description:
"there have been several incidents of domestic violence," said ms heard
amber heard, johnny depp are ending their marriage of 14 months
the duo met on the sets of the movie the rum diarythis image was posted on facebook by amber heard & johnny depp .
highlights
"there have been several incidents of domestic violence," said ms heard
amber heard, johnny depp are ending their marriage of 14 months
the duo met on the sets of the movie the rum diary
amber heard, who has filed for divorce from actor johnny depp and accused him of domestic violence, has released fresh photos which allegedly depict past incidents of abuse by the hollywood superstar, reported people magazine. 

the 30-year-old actress sports a cut lip and seemingly bruised eye in the new photos. the injuries were allegedly inflicted by depp, 52, in december 2015. 

ms heard has got a restraining order against the actor and claimed that besides the latest incident of violence on april 21, the actor was violent to him in the past as well. 

in documents filed on may 27 to seek a temporary restraining order against ms depp, ms heard had alleged that during the "entirety" of their four-year relationship, "mr depp has been verbally and physically abusive to me." 

she described a december event that possibly correlates with the alleged timeline of these new photos. 

"there also have been several prior incidents of domestic violence with johnny, in particular there was one severe incident in december 2015 when i truly feared that my life was in danger," she had said in her court declaration. 

mr depp's divorce attorney laura wasser claims that ms heard, who filed for divorce from mr depp on may 23, just 14 months of marriage, is "attempting to secure a premature financial resolution by alleging abuse." 

the actor's daughter lily-rose, his first wife lori ann allison and his ex-partner vanessa paradis had dismissed ms heard's allegations of domestic violence. 

an lapd spokesperson said the officers responded to a 911 call but determined there was "no evidence of any crime" at the scene. 

in a statement on tuesday, ms heard's lawyers said that she declined to make a statement to police at the time to "protect her privacy and johnny's career," but plans to make one and "hopes to give the lapd the opportunity to conduct an accurate and complete investigation."

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard Reveals New Photos of Alleged Abuse by Johnny Depp
snippet.localized.description:
"There have been several incidents of domestic violence," said Ms Heard
Amber Heard, Johnny Depp are ending their marriage of 14 months
The duo met on the sets of the movie The Rum DiaryThis image was posted on Facebook by Amber Heard & Johnny Depp .
HIGHLIGHTS
"There have been several incidents of domestic violence," said Ms Heard
Amber Heard, Johnny Depp are ending their marriage of 14 months
The duo met on the sets of the movie The Rum Diary
Amber Heard, who has filed for divorce from actor Johnny Depp and accused him of domestic violence, has released fresh photos which allegedly depict past incidents of abuse by the Hollywood superstar, reported People magazine. 

The 30-year-old actress sports a cut lip and seemingly bruised eye in the new photos. The injuries were allegedly inflicted by Depp, 52, in December 2015. 

Ms Heard has got a restraining order against the actor and claimed that besides the latest incident of violence on April 21, the actor was violent to him in the past as well. 

In documents filed on May 27 to seek a temporary restraining order against Ms Depp, Ms Heard had alleged that during the "entirety" of their four-year relationship, "Mr Depp has been verbally and physically abusive to me." 

She described a December event that possibly correlates with the alleged timeline of these new photos. 

"There also have been several prior incidents of domestic violence with Johnny, in particular there was one severe incident in December 2015 when I truly feared that my life was in danger," she had said in her court declaration. 

Mr Depp's divorce attorney Laura Wasser claims that Ms Heard, who filed for divorce from mr Depp on May 23, just 14 months of marriage, is "attempting to secure a premature financial resolution by alleging abuse." 

The actor's daughter Lily-Rose, his first wife Lori Ann Allison and his ex-partner Vanessa Paradis had dismissed Ms Heard's allegations of domestic violence. 

An LAPD spokesperson said the officers responded to a 911 call but determined there was "no evidence of any crime" at the scene. 

In a statement on Tuesday, Ms Heard's lawyers said that she declined to make a statement to police at the time to "protect her privacy and Johnny's career," but plans to make one and "hopes to give the LAPD the opportunity to conduct an accurate and complete investigation."

snippet.title: johnny depp and amber heard: australian biosecurity
snippet.description:
australia has very strict biosecurity laws to protect the health of our people, animals and plants. everyone entering the country must truthfully declare if they are carrying any items listed on the incoming passenger card.

ms amber heard appeared in the southport magistrates court in queensland on 18 april 2016 to answer charges alleging the illegal importation of her two dogs into australia in april 2015.

ms heard pleaded guilty to one count of producing a false document (her incoming passenger card).

ms heard also offered to publicly state her contrition with the support of her husband – this video is that statement.

captions courtesy of michael and lyn lockrey.
snippet.tags: ['johnny depp', 'amber heard', 'pistol & boo', 'barnaby joyce', 'biosecurity', 'quarantine', 'customs', 'pistol', 'boo', 'depp', 'heard', 'illegal', 'dogs', 'imports', 'court case', 'australia']
snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard: Australian biosecurity
snippet.localized.description:
Australia has very strict biosecurity laws to protect the health of our people, animals and plants. Everyone entering the country must truthfully declare if they are carrying any items listed on the Incoming Passenger Card.

Ms Amber Heard appeared in the Southport Magistrates Court in Queensland on 18 April 2016 to answer charges alleging the illegal importation of her two dogs into Australia in April 2015.

Ms Heard pleaded guilty to one count of producing a false document (her Incoming Passenger Card).

Ms Heard also offered to publicly state her contrition with the support of her husband – this video is that statement.

Captions courtesy of Michael and Lyn Lockrey.
contentDetails.caption: True

snippet.title: johnny depp decepciona fans por golpiza a su esposa amber heard video demanda
snippet.description:
johnny depp y amber heard resolvieron su polémico divorcio y la actriz retiró la denuncia de abuso físico que presentó contra el superastro de hollywood un día antes de que comenzara una audiencia por una orden de restricción en el caso.

"nuestra relación fue intensamente apasionada y por momentos volátil, pero siempre unida por el amor", dijeron heard y depp en un comunicado conjunto. "ninguna de las partes ha hecho falsas acusaciones por motivos financieros. nunca hubo intención alguna de ocasionar daños físicos ni emocionales".

heard presentó una solicitud de divorcio en mayo y días después obtuvo una orden de restricción tras acusar al astro de "los piratas del caribe" de haberla golpeado durante una pelea en su apartamento de los ángeles. depp, de 53 años, negó haber abusado de ella, y la policía dijo que no halló evidencia de un delito.

le puede interesar: la debacle de johnny depp

heard, de 30 años, quien entonces llegó a la corte con un moretón en la mejilla izquierda, justo debajo del ojo, acusó a depp de golpearla repetidas veces y arrojarle un celular durante la pelea. un juez le ordenó a depp que no contactara a heard y se mantuviera a por lo menos 91,4 metros (100 yardas) de ella.

la orden de alejamiento fue emitida el día que el más reciente filme de depp, "alice through the looking glass" ("alicia a través del espejo"), se estrenaba. la película fracasó en taquilla, al recaudar menos de 76 millones de dólares en sus primeras seis semanas.

el acuerdo se logró un día antes de que comenzara una audiencia de varios días en el caso. los detalles del acuerdo no fueron revelados. el abogado de heard, pierce o‘donnell, y los abogados de depp laura wasser y blair berk, tampoco respondieron a las llamadas que se les hicieron para conocer sus comentarios al respecto.

heard dijo que donará el dinero que reciba del divorcio a una organización de beneficencia no revelada.

"amber le desea lo mejor a johnny en el futuro", dice el comunicado, que no incluye un mensaje similar de parte de depp para la actriz.

heard había acusado a depp de abusar física y emocionalmente de ella a lo largo de la relación, que comenzó después de que se conocieron en el plató de la película de 2011 "the rum diary".

"en toda nuestra relación, johnny ha abusado verbal y físicamente de mí", escribió heard. "soporté el abuso emocional, verbal y físico de johnny, lo cual ha incluido amenazas furiosas, hostiles, humillantes y amenazadoras contra mí cuando cuestionaba su autoridad o no estaba de acuerdo con él".

heard le pidió el divorcio a depp el 23 de mayo argumentando diferencias irreconciliables. la pareja no tuvo hijos. era el segundo matrimonio de depp y el primero para heard.
snippet.localized.title: JOHNNY DEPP DECEPCIONA FANS POR GOLPIZA A SU ESPOSA AMBER HEARD VIDEO DEMANDA
snippet.localized.description:
Johnny Depp y Amber Heard resolvieron su polémico divorcio y la actriz retiró la denuncia de abuso físico que presentó contra el superastro de Hollywood un día antes de que comenzara una audiencia por una orden de restricción en el caso.

"Nuestra relación fue intensamente apasionada y por momentos volátil, pero siempre unida por el amor", dijeron Heard y Depp en un comunicado conjunto. "Ninguna de las partes ha hecho falsas acusaciones por motivos financieros. Nunca hubo intención alguna de ocasionar daños físicos ni emocionales".

Heard presentó una solicitud de divorcio en mayo y días después obtuvo una orden de restricción tras acusar al astro de "Los piratas del Caribe" de haberla golpeado durante una pelea en su apartamento de Los Ángeles. Depp, de 53 años, negó haber abusado de ella, y la policía dijo que no halló evidencia de un delito.

Le puede interesar: La debacle de Johnny Depp

Heard, de 30 años, quien entonces llegó a la corte con un moretón en la mejilla izquierda, justo debajo del ojo, acusó a Depp de golpearla repetidas veces y arrojarle un celular durante la pelea. Un juez le ordenó a Depp que no contactara a Heard y se mantuviera a por lo menos 91,4 metros (100 yardas) de ella.

La orden de alejamiento fue emitida el día que el más reciente filme de Depp, "Alice Through the Looking Glass" ("Alicia a través del espejo"), se estrenaba. La película fracasó en taquilla, al recaudar menos de 76 millones de dólares en sus primeras seis semanas.

El acuerdo se logró un día antes de que comenzara una audiencia de varios días en el caso. Los detalles del acuerdo no fueron revelados. El abogado de Heard, Pierce O‘Donnell, y los abogados de Depp Laura Wasser y Blair Berk, tampoco respondieron a las llamadas que se les hicieron para conocer sus comentarios al respecto.

Heard dijo que donará el dinero que reciba del divorcio a una organización de beneficencia no revelada.

"Amber le desea lo mejor a Johnny en el futuro", dice el comunicado, que no incluye un mensaje similar de parte de Depp para la actriz.

Heard había acusado a Depp de abusar física y emocionalmente de ella a lo largo de la relación, que comenzó después de que se conocieron en el plató de la película de 2011 "The Rum Diary".

"En toda nuestra relación, Johnny ha abusado verbal y físicamente de mí", escribió Heard. "Soporté el abuso emocional, verbal y físico de Johnny, lo cual ha incluido amenazas furiosas, hostiles, humillantes y amenazadoras contra mí cuando cuestionaba su autoridad o no estaba de acuerdo con él".

Heard le pidió el divorcio a Depp el 23 de mayo argumentando diferencias irreconciliables. La pareja no tuvo hijos. Era el segundo matrimonio de Depp y el primero para Heard.

snippet.title: johnny depp & amber heard apologise for illegally bringing dogs to australia
snippet.description:
johnny depp and amber heard apologised for bringing their dogs in to australia and affirmed the importance of the country’s biosecurity in a video posted to the facebook page of the deputy prime minister of australia, barnaby joyce.

depp and heard appeared in a gold coast court on monday, april 18, where heard pleaded guilty to falsifying quarantine documents before flying their two yorkshire terriers, pistol and boo, into australia on their private jet in april 2015, to visit depp while he was filming pirates of the caribbean. heard received a one month good behaviour bond without conviction.

Heard received a one month good behaviour bond without conviction.

snippet.description:
new reports claim leaked legal documents show amber heard is still fighting to get johnny depp to pay her legal fees, and said that she never violated the confidentiality provisions of their settlement. 

subscribe now for the latest daily hollywood celebrity splash tv news: https://goo.gl/jalp0u

best daily splash news daily celebrity playlist: https://goo.gl/qsxt0r

amber heard isn’t giving up her fight against johnny depp.

and her legal team is claiming johnny has not held up his end of the bargain.

according to new documents that were obtained by e! news, heard’s attorneys say the 53-year-old actors failed to pay the first two installments of their seven figure settlement as well as neglecting to transfer the title to their range rover into her name as well as the division of personal property.

she’s also requested that her legal fees – totaling a little over 35 thousand dollars – be taken care of.

in the docs, heard wrote a written declaration regarding johnny’s decision to try to give the money to a charity instead of her. she also wrote that he claimed she violated the confidentiality provisions of the deal point memorandum by announcing that she would be donating her settlement to charities. she also points out that she made those donations in good faith and was responding to the leaks by johnny’s agents bragging that she settled for substantially less than an earlier offer sum and attempting to label her as a gold digger. 

heard and depp announced their divorce back in may after reports claim the star was physically abusive.

snippet.localized.title: Leaked Docs Show Amber Heard is Still Fighting Johnny Depp for Money | Splash News TV
snippet.localized.description:
New reports claim leaked legal documents show Amber Heard is still fighting to get Johnny Depp to pay her legal fees, and said that she never violated the confidentiality provisions of their settlement. 

Subscribe now for the latest Daily Hollywood Celebrity Splash TV News: https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Best Daily Splash News Daily Celebrity Playlist: https://goo.gl/QsxT0r

Amber Heard isn’t giving up her fight against Johnny Depp.

And her legal team is claiming Johnny has not held up his end of the bargain.

According to new documents that were obtained by E! News, Heard’s attorneys say the 53-year-old actors failed to pay the first two installments of their seven figure settlement as well as neglecting to transfer the title to their Range Rover into her name as well as the division of personal property.

She’s also requested that her legal fees – totaling a little over 35 thousand dollars – be taken care of.

In the docs, Heard wrote a written declaration regarding Johnny’s decision to try to give the money to a charity instead of her. She also wrote that he claimed she violated the confidentiality provisions of the Deal Point Memorandum by announcing that she would be donating her settlement to charities. She also points out that she made those donations in good faith and was responding to the leaks by Johnny’s agents bragging that she settled for substantially less than an earlier offer sum and attempting to label her as a gold digger. 

Heard and Depp announced their divorce back in May after reports claim the star was physically abusive.

the fourth and last season of the show overhaulin’ aired on 4th nov 2015.

when amber heard moved to los angeles, she bought a 1968 mustang, which she fell in love with. she said that it originally ate away at her wallet for many years, but she’s hung onto the car regardless. in the above video, heard is surprised by her husband johnny depp, her dad and the show’s cast about getting her car restored. but, they all decide to pull a prank on her first, making her believe her car had been stolen.

snippet.localized.title: Amber Heard's Overhauled Mustang Is Revealed
snippet.localized.description:
The fourth and last season of the show Overhaulin’ aired on 4th Nov 2015.

When Amber Heard moved to Los Angeles, she bought a 1968 Mustang, which she fell in love with. She said that it originally ate away at her wallet for many years, but she’s hung onto the car regardless. In the above video, Heard is surprised by her husband Johnny Depp, her dad and the show’s cast about getting her car restored. But, they all decide to pull a prank on her first, making her believe her car had been stolen.

And, in the video, we see the finished product once the car has been fully restored. The sight of the car brings Heard to tears.    Her husband (soon to be ex husband) is please for her.

Whee it all go wrong Amber ?
